74 class cbFileDropTarget : public wxFileDropTarget
75 {
76 public:
77  cbFileDropTarget(MainFrame *frame):m_frame(frame){}
78  virtual bool OnDropFiles(wxCoord x, wxCoord y, const wxArrayString& filenames)
79  {
80  if (!m_frame) return false;
81  return m_frame->OnDropFiles(x,y,filenames);
82  }
83 private:
84  MainFrame* m_frame;
85 };

95 // In <wx/defs.h> wxID_FILE[X] exists only from 1..9,
96 // so create our own here with a *continuous* numbering!
97 // The wxID_FILE[X] enum usually starts at 5050 until 5059,
98 // followed by wxID_OK starting at 5100. (wxWidgets v2.6, v2.8 and v2.9)
99 // so we use the space in between starting from 5060
100 // and hoping it doesn't change too much in <wx/defs.h> ;-)
101 enum
102 {
103  wxID_CBFILE01 = 5060, // Recent files...
104  wxID_CBFILE02, // 5061
105  wxID_CBFILE03, // 5062
106  wxID_CBFILE04, // 5063
107  wxID_CBFILE05, // 5064
108  wxID_CBFILE06, // 5065
109  wxID_CBFILE07, // 5066
110  wxID_CBFILE08, // 5067
111  wxID_CBFILE09, // 5068
112  wxID_CBFILE10, // 5069
113  wxID_CBFILE11, // 5070
114  wxID_CBFILE12, // 5071
115  wxID_CBFILE13, // 5072
116  wxID_CBFILE14, // 5073
117  wxID_CBFILE15, // 5074
118  wxID_CBFILE16, // 5075
119  wxID_CBFILE17, // 5076 // Starting here for recent projects...
120  wxID_CBFILE18, // 5077
121  wxID_CBFILE19, // 5078
122  wxID_CBFILE20, // 5079
123  wxID_CBFILE21, // 5080
124  wxID_CBFILE22, // 5081
125  wxID_CBFILE23, // 5082
126  wxID_CBFILE24, // 5083
127  wxID_CBFILE25, // 5084
128  wxID_CBFILE26, // 5085
129  wxID_CBFILE27, // 5086
130  wxID_CBFILE28, // 5087
131  wxID_CBFILE29, // 5088
132  wxID_CBFILE30, // 5089
133  wxID_CBFILE31, // 5090
134  wxID_CBFILE32 // 5091
135 };

557 MainFrame::MainFrame(wxWindow* parent)
558  : wxFrame(parent, -1, _T("MainWin"), wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, wxDEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE | wxNO_FULL_REPAINT_ON_RESIZE),
559  m_LayoutManager(this),
560  m_pAccel(nullptr),
561  m_filesHistory(_("&File"), wxT("/recent_files"), idFileOpenRecentFileClearHistory, wxID_CBFILE01),
562  m_projectsHistory(_("&File"), wxT("/recent_projects"), idFileOpenRecentProjectClearHistory, wxID_CBFILE17),
563  m_pCloseFullScreenBtn(nullptr),
564  m_pEdMan(nullptr),
565  m_pPrjMan(nullptr),
566  m_pPrjManUI(nullptr),
567  m_pLogMan(nullptr),
568  m_pInfoPane(nullptr),
569  m_pToolbar(nullptr),
570  m_ToolsMenu(nullptr),
571  m_HelpPluginsMenu(nullptr),
572  m_ScanningForPlugins(false),
573  m_StartupDone(false), // one-time flag
574  m_InitiatedShutdown(false),
575  m_AutoHideLockCounter(0),
576  m_LastCtrlAltTabWindow(0),
577  m_LastLayoutIsTemp(false),
578  m_pScriptConsole(nullptr),
579  m_pBatchBuildDialog(nullptr),
580  // Highlightbutton
581  m_pHighlightButton(nullptr)
582 {
583  Manager::Get(this); // provide manager with handle to MainFrame (this)
584 
585  // register event sinks
586  RegisterEvents();
587 
588  // New: Allow drag and drop of files into the editor
589  SetDropTarget(new cbFileDropTarget(this));
590 
591  // Accelerator table
592  wxAcceleratorEntry entries[8];
593  entries[0].Set(wxACCEL_CTRL | wxACCEL_SHIFT, (int) 'W', idFileCloseAll);
594  entries[1].Set(wxACCEL_CTRL | wxACCEL_SHIFT, WXK_F4, idFileCloseAll);
595  entries[2].Set(wxACCEL_CTRL, (int) 'W', idFileClose);
596  entries[3].Set(wxACCEL_CTRL, WXK_F4, idFileClose);
597  entries[4].Set(wxACCEL_CTRL, WXK_F6, idFileNext);
598  entries[5].Set(wxACCEL_CTRL | wxACCEL_SHIFT, WXK_F6, idFilePrev);
599  entries[6].Set(wxACCEL_SHIFT, WXK_TAB, idShiftTab);
600  entries[7].Set(wxACCEL_CTRL | wxACCEL_ALT, WXK_TAB, idCtrlAltTab);
601  m_pAccel = new wxAcceleratorTable(8, entries);
602 
603  SetAcceleratorTable(*m_pAccel);
604 
605  // add file filters for supported projects/workspaces
606  FileFilters::AddDefaultFileFilters();
607 
608  ConfigManager* cfg = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"));
609  m_SmallToolBar = cfg->ReadBool(_T("/environment/toolbar_size"), true);
610  CreateIDE();
611 
612 #ifdef __WXMSW__
613  SetIcon(wxICON(A_MAIN_ICON));
614 #else
615  SetIcon(wxIcon(app));
616 #endif // __WXMSW__
617 
618  // even it is possible that the statusbar is not visible at the moment, create the statusbar so the plugins can create their own fields on the it:
619  DoCreateStatusBar();
620  SetStatusText(_("Welcome to ")+ appglobals::AppName + _T("!"));
621 
622  wxStatusBar *sb = GetStatusBar();
623  if (sb)
624  sb->Show(cfg->ReadBool(_T("/main_frame/statusbar"), true));
625 
626  SetTitle(appglobals::AppName + _T(" v") + appglobals::AppVersion);
627 
628  LoadWindowSize();
629  ScanForPlugins();
630  CreateToolbars();
631 
632  Manager::Get()->GetCCManager();
633 
634  // save default view
635  wxString deflayout = cfg->Read(_T("/main_frame/layout/default"));
636  if (deflayout.IsEmpty())
637  cfg->Write(_T("/main_frame/layout/default"), gDefaultLayout);
638  DoFixToolbarsLayout();
639  gDefaultLayoutData = m_LayoutManager.SavePerspective(); // keep the "hardcoded" layout handy
640  gDefaultMessagePaneLayoutData = m_pInfoPane->SaveTabOrder();
641  SaveViewLayout(gDefaultLayout, gDefaultLayoutData, gDefaultMessagePaneLayoutData);
642 
643  // generate default minimal layout
644  wxAuiPaneInfoArray& panes = m_LayoutManager.GetAllPanes();
645  for (size_t i = 0; i < panes.GetCount(); ++i)
646  {
647  wxAuiPaneInfo& info = panes[i];
648  if (!(info.name == _T("MainPane")))
649  info.Hide();
650  }
651  gMinimalLayoutData = m_LayoutManager.SavePerspective(); // keep the "hardcoded" layout handy
652  gMinimalMessagePaneLayoutData = m_pInfoPane->SaveTabOrder();
653  SaveViewLayout(gMinimalLayout, gMinimalLayoutData, gMinimalMessagePaneLayoutData);
654 
655  LoadWindowState();
656 
657  ShowHideStartPage();
658 
659  RegisterScriptFunctions();
660  RunStartupScripts();
661 
662  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->DebugLog(_T("Initializing plugins..."));
663 }
664 
665 MainFrame::~MainFrame()
666 {
667  SetAcceleratorTable(wxNullAcceleratorTable);
668  delete m_pAccel;
669 
670  DeInitPrinting();
671 
672  delete m_debuggerMenuHandler;
673  delete m_debuggerToolbarHandler;
674 }

717 void MainFrame::ShowTips(bool forceShow)
718 {
719  bool showAtStartup = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadBool(_T("/show_tips"), false);
720  if (forceShow || showAtStartup)
721  {
722  wxString tipsFile = ConfigManager::GetDataFolder() + _T("/tips.txt");
723  long tipsIndex = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadInt(_T("/next_tip"), 0);
724  wxTipProvider* tipProvider = wxCreateFileTipProvider(tipsFile, tipsIndex);
725  showAtStartup = wxShowTip(this, tipProvider, showAtStartup);
726  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(_T("/show_tips"), showAtStartup);
727  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(_T("/next_tip"), (int)tipProvider->GetCurrentTip());
728  delete tipProvider;
729  }
730 }

732 void MainFrame::CreateIDE()
733 {
734  int leftW = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadInt(_T("/main_frame/layout/left_block_width"), 200);
735  wxSize clientsize = GetClientSize();
736 
737  // Create CloseFullScreen Button, and hide it initially
738  m_pCloseFullScreenBtn = new wxButton(this, idCloseFullScreen, _( "Close full screen" ), wxDefaultPosition );
739  m_pCloseFullScreenBtn->Show( false );
740 
741  // management panel
742  m_pPrjMan = Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager();
743  if (!Manager::IsBatchBuild())
744  {
745  m_pPrjManUI = new ProjectManagerUI;
746  m_LayoutManager.AddPane( m_pPrjManUI->GetNotebook(),
747  wxAuiPaneInfo().Name(wxT("ManagementPane")).Caption(_("Management")).
748  BestSize(wxSize(leftW, clientsize.GetHeight())).
749  MinSize(wxSize(100,100)).Left().Layer(1) );
750  }
751  else
752  m_pPrjManUI = new BatchProjectManagerUI;
753  m_pPrjMan->SetUI(m_pPrjManUI);
754 
755  // logs manager
756  SetupGUILogging();
757  SetupDebuggerUI();
758 
759  CreateMenubar();
760 
761  m_pEdMan = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager();
762  m_pLogMan = Manager::Get()->GetLogManager();
763 
764  // editor manager
765  m_LayoutManager.AddPane(m_pEdMan->GetNotebook(), wxAuiPaneInfo().Name(wxT("MainPane")).
766  CentrePane());
767 
768  // script console
769  m_pScriptConsole = new ScriptConsole(this, -1);
770  m_LayoutManager.AddPane(m_pScriptConsole, wxAuiPaneInfo().Name(wxT("ScriptConsole")).
771  Caption(_("Scripting console")).Float().MinSize(100,100).FloatingPosition(300, 200).Hide());
772 
773  DoUpdateLayout();
774  DoUpdateLayoutColours();
775  DoUpdateEditorStyle();
776 
777  m_pEdMan->GetNotebook()->SetDropTarget(new cbFileDropTarget(this));
778  if (m_pPrjManUI->GetNotebook())
779  m_pPrjManUI->GetNotebook()->SetDropTarget(new cbFileDropTarget(this));
780 
781  Manager::Get()->GetColourManager()->Load();
782 }

784 
785 void MainFrame::SetupGUILogging()
786 {
787  // allow new docked windows to use be 3/4 of the available space, the default (0.3) is sometimes too small, especially for "Logs & others"
788  m_LayoutManager.SetDockSizeConstraint(0.75,0.75);
789 
790  int bottomH = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadInt(_T("/main_frame/layout/bottom_block_height"), 150);
791  wxSize clientsize = GetClientSize();
792 
793  LogManager* mgr = Manager::Get()->GetLogManager();
794 
795  if (!Manager::IsBatchBuild())
796  {
797  m_pInfoPane = new InfoPane(this);
798  m_LayoutManager.AddPane(m_pInfoPane, wxAuiPaneInfo().
799  Name(wxT("MessagesPane")).Caption(_("Logs & others")).
800  BestSize(wxSize(clientsize.GetWidth(), bottomH)).//MinSize(wxSize(50,50)).
801  Bottom());
802 
803  wxWindow* log;
804 
805  for (size_t i = LogManager::app_log; i < LogManager::max_logs; ++i)
806  {
807  if ((log = mgr->Slot(i).GetLogger()->CreateControl(m_pInfoPane)))
808  m_pInfoPane->AddLogger(mgr->Slot(i).GetLogger(), log, mgr->Slot(i).title, mgr->Slot(i).icon);
809  }
810 
811  m_findReplace.CreateSearchLog();
812  }
813  else
814  {
815  m_pBatchBuildDialog = new BatchLogWindow(this, _("Code::Blocks - Batch build"));
816  wxSizer* s = new wxBoxSizer(wxVERTICAL);
817  m_pInfoPane = new InfoPane(m_pBatchBuildDialog);
818  s->Add(m_pInfoPane, 1, wxEXPAND);
819  m_pBatchBuildDialog->SetSizer(s);
820 
821  // setting &g_null_log causes the app to crash on exit for some reason...
822  mgr->SetLog(new NullLogger, LogManager::app_log);
823  mgr->SetLog(new NullLogger, LogManager::debug_log);
824  }
825 
826  mgr->NotifyUpdate();
827  m_pInfoPane->SetDropTarget(new cbFileDropTarget(this));
828 }
829 
830 void MainFrame::SetupDebuggerUI()
831 {
832  m_debuggerMenuHandler = new DebuggerMenuHandler;
833  m_debuggerToolbarHandler = new DebuggerToolbarHandler(m_debuggerMenuHandler);
834  m_debuggerMenuHandler->SetEvtHandlerEnabled(false);
835  m_debuggerToolbarHandler->SetEvtHandlerEnabled(false);
836  wxWindow* window = Manager::Get()->GetAppWindow();
837  if (window)
838  {
839  window->PushEventHandler(m_debuggerMenuHandler);
840  window->PushEventHandler(m_debuggerToolbarHandler);
841  }
842  m_debuggerMenuHandler->SetEvtHandlerEnabled(true);
843  m_debuggerToolbarHandler->SetEvtHandlerEnabled(true);
844 
845  if (!Manager::IsBatchBuild())
846  {
847  Manager::Get()->GetDebuggerManager()->SetInterfaceFactory(new DebugInterfaceFactory);
848  m_debuggerMenuHandler->RegisterDefaultWindowItems();
849  }
850 }

854 void MainFrame::RegisterScriptFunctions()
855 {
856  SqPlus::SQClassDef<MainFrame>("MainFrame").
857  func(&MainFrame::Open, "Open");
858 
859  SqPlus::BindVariable(this, "App", SqPlus::VAR_ACCESS_READ_ONLY);
860 }
861 
862 void MainFrame::RunStartupScripts()
863 {
864  ConfigManager* mgr = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("scripting"));
865  wxArrayString keys = mgr->EnumerateKeys(_T("/startup_scripts"));
866 
867  for (size_t i = 0; i < keys.GetCount(); ++i)
868  {
869  ScriptEntry se;
870  wxString ser;
871  if (mgr->Read(_T("/startup_scripts/") + keys[i], &ser))
872  {
873  se.SerializeIn(ser);
874  if (!se.enabled)
875  continue;
876 
877  try
878  {
879  wxString startup = se.script;
880  if (wxFileName(se.script).IsRelative())
881  startup = ConfigManager::LocateDataFile(se.script, sdScriptsUser | sdScriptsGlobal);
882  if (!startup.IsEmpty())
883  {
884  if (!se.registered)
885  Manager::Get()->GetScriptingManager()->LoadScript(startup);
886  else if (!se.menu.IsEmpty())
887  Manager::Get()->GetScriptingManager()->RegisterScriptMenu(se.menu, startup, false);
888  else
889  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->LogWarning(F(_("Startup script/function '%s' not loaded: invalid configuration"), se.script.wx_str()));
890  }
891  else
892  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->LogWarning(F(_("Startup script '%s' not found"), se.script.wx_str()));
893  }
894  catch (SquirrelError& exception)
895  {
896  Manager::Get()->GetScriptingManager()->DisplayErrors(&exception);
897  }
898  }
899  }
900 }
901 
902 void MainFrame::PluginsUpdated(cb_unused cbPlugin* plugin, cb_unused int status)
903 {
904  Freeze();
905 
906  // menu
907  RecreateMenuBar();
908 
909  // update view->toolbars because we re-created the menubar
910  PluginElementsArray plugins = Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->GetPlugins();
911  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < plugins.GetCount(); ++i)
912  {
913  cbPlugin* plug = plugins[i]->plugin;
914  const PluginInfo* info = Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->GetPluginInfo(plug);
915  if (!info)
916  continue;
917 
918  if (m_PluginsTools[plug]) // if plugin has a toolbar
919  {
920  // toolbar exists; add the menu item
921  wxMenu* viewToolbars = nullptr;
922  GetMenuBar()->FindItem(idViewToolMain, &viewToolbars);
923  if (viewToolbars)
924  {
925  if (viewToolbars->FindItem(info->title) != wxNOT_FOUND)
926  continue;
927  wxMenuItem* item = AddPluginInMenus(viewToolbars, plug,
928  (wxObjectEventFunction)(wxEventFunction)(wxCommandEventFunction)&MainFrame::OnToggleBar,
929  -1, true);
930  if (item)
931  {
932  item->Check(IsWindowReallyShown(m_PluginsTools[plug]));
933  }
934  }
935  }
936  }
937 
938  Thaw();
939 }
940 
941 void MainFrame::RecreateMenuBar()
942 {
943  Freeze();
944 
945  wxMenuBar* m = GetMenuBar();
946  SetMenuBar(nullptr); // unhook old menubar
947  CreateMenubar(); // create new menubar
948  delete m; // delete old menubar
949 
950  // update layouts menu
951  for (LayoutViewsMap::iterator it = m_LayoutViews.begin(); it != m_LayoutViews.end(); ++it)
952  {
953  if (it->first.IsEmpty())
954  continue;
955  SaveViewLayout(it->first, it->second,
956  m_LayoutMessagePane[it->first],
957  it->first == m_LastLayoutName);
958  }
959 
960  Thaw();
961 }

963 void MainFrame::CreateMenubar()
964 {
965  CodeBlocksEvent event(cbEVT_MENUBAR_CREATE_BEGIN);
966  Manager::Get()->ProcessEvent(event);
967 
968  int tmpidx;
969  wxMenuBar* mbar=nullptr;
970  wxMenu *hl=nullptr, *tools=nullptr, *plugs=nullptr, *pluginsM=nullptr;
971  wxMenuItem *tmpitem=nullptr;
972 
973  wxXmlResource* xml_res = wxXmlResource::Get();
974  wxString resPath = ConfigManager::GetDataFolder();
975  xml_res->Load(resPath + _T("/resources.zip#zip:main_menu.xrc"));
976  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->DebugLog(_T("Loading menubar..."));
977  mbar = xml_res->LoadMenuBar(_T("main_menu_bar"));
978  if (!mbar)
979  mbar = new wxMenuBar(); // Some error happened.
980  if (mbar)
981  SetMenuBar(mbar);
982 
983  // Find Menus that we'll change later
984 
985  tmpidx = mbar->FindMenu(_("&Edit"));
986  if (tmpidx!=wxNOT_FOUND)
987  {
988  mbar->FindItem(idEditHighlightModeText, &hl);
989  if (hl)
990  {
991  EditorColourSet* colour_set = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetColourSet();
992  if (colour_set)
993  {
994  wxArrayString langs = colour_set->GetAllHighlightLanguages();
995  for (size_t i = 0; i < langs.GetCount(); ++i)
996  {
997  if (i > 0 && !(i % 20))
998  hl->Break(); // break into columns every 20 items
999  int id = wxNewId();
1000  hl->AppendRadioItem(id, langs[i],
1001  wxString::Format(_("Switch highlighting mode for current document to \"%s\""), langs[i].wx_str()));
1002  Connect(id, -1, wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,
1003  (wxObjectEventFunction) (wxEventFunction) (wxCommandEventFunction)
1004  &MainFrame::OnEditHighlightMode);
1005  }
1006  }
1007  }
1008  const wxLanguageInfo* info = wxLocale::GetLanguageInfo(wxLANGUAGE_DEFAULT);
1009  wxMenu* editMenu = mbar->GetMenu(tmpidx);
1010  if ( info
1011  && ( ( info->Language >= wxLANGUAGE_CHINESE
1012  && info->Language <= wxLANGUAGE_CHINESE_TAIWAN )
1013  || info->Language == wxLANGUAGE_JAPANESE
1014  || info->Language == wxLANGUAGE_KOREAN ) )
1015  {
1016  editMenu->Append(idEditCompleteCode, _("Complete code\tShift-Space"));
1017  }
1018  else
1019  editMenu->Append(idEditCompleteCode, _("Complete code\tCtrl-Space"));
1020  }
1021 
1022  tmpidx = mbar->FindMenu(_("&Tools"));
1023  if (tmpidx!=wxNOT_FOUND)
1024  tools = mbar->GetMenu(tmpidx);
1025 
1026  tmpidx = mbar->FindMenu(_("P&lugins"));
1027  if (tmpidx!=wxNOT_FOUND)
1028  plugs = mbar->GetMenu(tmpidx);
1029 
1030  if ((tmpitem = mbar->FindItem(idHelpPlugins,nullptr)))
1031  pluginsM = tmpitem->GetSubMenu();
1032 
1033  m_ToolsMenu = tools ? tools : new wxMenu();
1034  m_PluginsMenu = plugs ? plugs : new wxMenu();
1035  m_HelpPluginsMenu = pluginsM ? pluginsM : new wxMenu();
1036 
1037  // core modules: create menus
1038  if (!Manager::IsBatchBuild())
1039  static_cast<ProjectManagerUI*>(m_pPrjManUI)->CreateMenu(mbar);
1040  Manager::Get()->GetDebuggerManager()->SetMenuHandler(m_debuggerMenuHandler);
1041 
1042  // ask all plugins to rebuild their menus
1043  PluginElementsArray plugins = Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->GetPlugins();
1044  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < plugins.GetCount(); ++i)
1045  {
1046  cbPlugin* plug = plugins[i]->plugin;
1047  if (plug && plug->IsAttached())
1048  {
1049  if (plug->GetType() == ptTool)
1050  DoAddPlugin(plug);
1051  else
1052  {
1053  AddPluginInHelpPluginsMenu(plug);
1054  try
1055  {
1056  plug->BuildMenu(mbar);
1057  }
1058  catch (cbException& e)
1059  {
1060  e.ShowErrorMessage();
1061  }
1062  }
1063  }
1064  }
1065 
1066  Manager::Get()->GetToolsManager()->BuildToolsMenu(m_ToolsMenu);
1067 
1068  // Ctrl+Tab workaround for non windows platforms:
1069  if ((platform::carbon) || (platform::gtk))
1070  {
1071  // Find the menu item for tab switching:
1072  tmpidx = mbar->FindMenu(_("&View"));
1073  if (tmpidx != wxNOT_FOUND)
1074  {
1075  wxMenu* view = mbar->GetMenu(tmpidx);
1076  wxMenuItem* switch_item = view->FindItem(idViewSwitchTabs);
1077  if (switch_item)
1078  {
1079  // Change the accelerator for this menu item:
1080  wxString accel;
1081  if (platform::carbon)
1082  accel = wxT("Alt+Tab");
1083  else if (platform::gtk)
1084  accel = wxT("Ctrl+,");
1085  switch_item->SetItemLabel(wxString(_("S&witch tabs")) + wxT("\t") + accel);
1086  }
1087  }
1088  }
1089 
1090  SetMenuBar(mbar);
1091  InitializeRecentFilesHistory();
1092 
1093  CodeBlocksEvent event2(cbEVT_MENUBAR_CREATE_END);
1094  Manager::Get()->ProcessEvent(event2);
1095 }

1097 void MainFrame::CreateToolbars()
1098 {
1099  if (m_pToolbar)
1100  {
1101  SetToolBar(nullptr);
1102  m_pToolbar = nullptr;
1103  }
1104 
1105  wxString xrcToolbarName(_T("main_toolbar"));
1106  if (m_SmallToolBar) // Insert logic here
1107  xrcToolbarName += _T("_16x16");
1108 
1109  wxXmlResource* xml_res = wxXmlResource::Get();
1110  wxString resPath = ConfigManager::GetDataFolder();
1111  xml_res->Load(resPath + _T("/resources.zip#zip:") + xrcToolbarName + _T("*.xrc"));
1112  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->DebugLog(_T("Loading toolbar..."));
1113 
1114  m_pToolbar = Manager::Get()->CreateEmptyToolbar();
1115  Manager::Get()->AddonToolBar(m_pToolbar, xrcToolbarName);
1116 
1117  m_pToolbar->Realize();
1118 
1119  // Right click on the main toolbar will popup a context menu
1120  m_pToolbar->Connect(wxID_ANY, wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOL_RCLICKED, wxCommandEventHandler(MainFrame::OnToolBarRightClick), NULL, this);
1121 
1122  m_pToolbar->SetInitialSize();
1123 
1124  // Right click on the debugger toolbar will popup a context menu
1125  m_debuggerToolbarHandler->GetToolbar()->Connect(wxID_ANY, wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOL_RCLICKED, wxCommandEventHandler(MainFrame::OnToolBarRightClick), NULL, this );
1126 
1127  std::vector<ToolbarInfo> toolbars;
1128 
1129  toolbars.push_back(ToolbarInfo(m_pToolbar, wxAuiPaneInfo().Name(wxT("MainToolbar")).Caption(_("Main Toolbar")), 0));
1130  toolbars.push_back(ToolbarInfo(m_debuggerToolbarHandler->GetToolbar(),
1131  wxAuiPaneInfo(). Name(wxT("DebuggerToolbar")).Caption(_("Debugger Toolbar")),
1132  2));
1133 
1134  // ask all plugins to rebuild their toolbars
1135  PluginElementsArray plugins = Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->GetPlugins();
1136  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < plugins.GetCount(); ++i)
1137  {
1138  cbPlugin* plug = plugins[i]->plugin;
1139  if (plug && plug->IsAttached())
1140  {
1141  ToolbarInfo info = DoAddPluginToolbar(plug);
1142  if (info.toolbar)
1143  {
1144  toolbars.push_back(info);
1145  // support showing context menu of the plugins' toolbar
1146  info.toolbar->Connect(wxID_ANY, wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOL_RCLICKED,
1147  wxCommandEventHandler(MainFrame::OnToolBarRightClick), NULL, this );
1148  }
1149  }
1150  }
1151 
1152  std::sort(toolbars.begin(), toolbars.end());
1153 
1154  int row = 0, position = 0, rowLength = 0;
1155  int maxLength = GetSize().x;
1156 
1157  for (std::vector<ToolbarInfo>::iterator it = toolbars.begin(); it != toolbars.end(); ++it)
1158  {
1159  rowLength += it->toolbar->GetSize().x;
1160  if (rowLength >= maxLength)
1161  {
1162  row++;
1163  position = 0;
1164  rowLength = it->toolbar->GetSize().x;
1165  }
1166  wxAuiPaneInfo paneInfo(it->paneInfo);
1167  m_LayoutManager.AddPane(it->toolbar, paneInfo.ToolbarPane().Top().Row(row).Position(position));
1168 
1169  position += it->toolbar->GetSize().x;
1170  }
1171  DoUpdateLayout();
1172 
1173  Manager::ProcessPendingEvents();
1174  SetToolBar(nullptr);
1175 }

1184 void MainFrame::ScanForPlugins()
1185 {
1186  m_ScanningForPlugins = true;
1187  m_PluginIDsMap.clear();
1188 
1189  PluginManager* m_PluginManager = Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager();
1190 
1191  // user paths first
1192  wxString path = ConfigManager::GetPluginsFolder(false);
1193  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->Log(_("Scanning for plugins in ") + path);
1194  int count = m_PluginManager->ScanForPlugins(path);
1195 
1196  // global paths
1197  path = ConfigManager::GetPluginsFolder(true);
1198  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->Log(_("Scanning for plugins in ") + path);
1199  count += m_PluginManager->ScanForPlugins(path);
1200 
1201  // actually load plugins
1202  if (count > 0)
1203  {
1204  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->Log(_("Loading:"));
1205  m_PluginManager->LoadAllPlugins();
1206  }
1207 
1208  CodeBlocksEvent event(cbEVT_PLUGIN_LOADING_COMPLETE);
1209  Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->NotifyPlugins(event);
1210  m_ScanningForPlugins = false;
1211 }

1213 wxMenuItem* MainFrame::AddPluginInMenus(wxMenu* menu, cbPlugin* plugin, wxObjectEventFunction callback, int pos, bool checkable)
1214 {
1215  wxMenuItem* item = nullptr;
1216  if (!plugin || !menu)
1217  return item;
1218 
1219  const PluginInfo* info = Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->GetPluginInfo(plugin);
1220  if (!info)
1221  return nullptr;
1222 
1223  PluginIDsMap::iterator it;
1224  for (it = m_PluginIDsMap.begin(); it != m_PluginIDsMap.end(); ++it)
1225  {
1226  if (it->second == info->name)
1227  {
1228  item = menu->FindItem(it->first);
1229  if (item)
1230  return item;
1231  }
1232  }
1233 
1234  int id = wxNewId();
1235  wxString title = info->title + (menu == m_HelpPluginsMenu ? _T("...") : wxEmptyString);
1236  m_PluginIDsMap[id] = info->name;
1237  if (pos == -1)
1238  pos = menu->GetMenuItemCount();
1239 
1240  while(!item)
1241  {
1242 #if wxCHECK_VERSION(3, 0, 0)
1243  if (!pos || title.CmpNoCase(menu->FindItemByPosition(pos - 1)->GetItemLabelText()) > 0)
1244 #else
1245  if (!pos || title.CmpNoCase(menu->FindItemByPosition(pos - 1)->GetLabel()) > 0)
1246 #endif
1247  item = menu->Insert(pos, id, title, wxEmptyString, checkable ? wxITEM_CHECK : wxITEM_NORMAL);
1248 
1249  --pos;
1250  }
1251 
1252  Connect( id, wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED, callback );
1253  return item;
1254 }

1261

1263  if (m_PluginsMenu->GetMenuItemCount() == 1)
1264  m_PluginsMenu->Insert(0, wxID_SEPARATOR, _T(""));
1265 
1266  AddPluginInMenus(m_PluginsMenu, plugin,
1267  (wxObjectEventFunction)(wxEventFunction)(wxCommandEventFunction)&MainFrame::OnPluginsExecuteMenu,
1268  m_PluginsMenu->GetMenuItemCount() - 2);
1269 }

1277 void MainFrame::LoadWindowState()
1278 {
1279  wxArrayString subs = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->EnumerateSubPaths(_T("/main_frame/layout"));
1280  for (size_t i = 0; i < subs.GetCount(); ++i)
1281  {
1282  wxString name = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Read(_T("/main_frame/layout/") + subs[i] + _T("/name"));
1283  wxString layout = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Read(_T("/main_frame/layout/") + subs[i] + _T("/data"));
1284  wxString layoutMP = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Read(_T("/main_frame/layout/") + subs[i] + _T("/dataMessagePane"));
1285  SaveViewLayout(name, layout, layoutMP);
1286  }
1287  wxString deflayout = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Read(_T("/main_frame/layout/default"));
1288  LoadViewLayout(deflayout);
1289 
1290  // load manager and messages selected page
1291  if (m_pPrjManUI->GetNotebook())
1292  m_pPrjManUI->GetNotebook()->SetSelection(Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadInt(_T("/main_frame/layout/left_block_selection"), 0));
1293  m_pInfoPane->SetSelection(Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadInt(_T("/main_frame/layout/bottom_block_selection"), 0));
1294 
1295  // Cryogen 23/3/10 wxAuiNotebook can't set it's own tab position once instantiated, for some reason. This code fails in InfoPane::InfoPane().
1296  // Moved here as this seems like a resonable place to do UI setup. Feel free to move it elsewhere.
1297  if (Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadBool(_T("/environment/infopane_tabs_bottom"), false))
1298  m_pInfoPane->SetWindowStyleFlag(m_pInfoPane->GetWindowStyleFlag() | wxAUI_NB_BOTTOM);
1299 
1300 }
1301 
1302 void MainFrame::LoadWindowSize()
1303 {
1304 #ifndef __WXMAC__
1305  int x = 0;
1306  int y = 0;
1307 #else
1308  int x = 0;
1309  int y = wxSystemSettings::GetMetric(wxSYS_MENU_Y, this); // make sure it doesn't hide under the menu bar
1310 #endif
1311  int w = 1000;
1312  int h = 800;
1313 
1314  // obtain display index used last time
1315  int last_display_index = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadInt(_T("/main_frame/layout/display"), 0);
1316  // load window size and position
1317  wxRect rect(Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadInt(_T("/main_frame/layout/left"), x),
1318  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadInt(_T("/main_frame/layout/top"), y),
1319  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadInt(_T("/main_frame/layout/width"), w),
1320  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadInt(_T("/main_frame/layout/height"), h));
1321  // maximize if needed
1322  bool maximized = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadBool(_T("/main_frame/layout/maximized"), true);
1323  Maximize(maximized); // toggle
1324 
1325  // set display, size and position
1326  int display_index_window = wxDisplay::GetFromWindow(this); // C::B usually starts on primary display...
1327  // ...but try to use display that was used last time, if still available:
1328  if ((last_display_index>=0) && (last_display_index<static_cast<int>(wxDisplay::GetCount())))
1329  display_index_window = static_cast<int>(last_display_index);
1330  int display_index = ((display_index_window>=0) ? display_index_window : 0);
1331 
1332  wxDisplay disp(display_index); // index might be wxNOT_FOUND (=-1) due to GetFromWindow call
1333  if (maximized)
1334  {
1335  rect = disp.GetClientArea(); // apply from display, overriding settings above
1336  rect.width -= 100;
1337  rect.height -= 100;
1338  }
1339  else
1340  {
1341  // Adjust to actual screen size. This is useful for portable C::B versions,
1342  // where the window might be out of screen when saving on a two-monitor
1343  // system an re-opening on a one-monitor system (on Windows, at least).
1344  wxRect displayRect = disp.GetClientArea();
1345  if ((displayRect.GetLeft() + displayRect.GetWidth()) < rect.GetLeft()) rect.SetLeft (displayRect.GetLeft() );
1346  if ((displayRect.GetLeft() + displayRect.GetWidth()) < rect.GetRight()) rect.SetRight (displayRect.GetRight() );
1347  if ((displayRect.GetTop() + displayRect.GetHeight()) < rect.GetTop()) rect.SetTop (displayRect.GetTop() );
1348  if ((displayRect.GetTop() + displayRect.GetHeight()) < rect.GetBottom()) rect.SetBottom(displayRect.GetBottom());
1349  }
1350 
1351  SetSize(rect);
1352 }
1353 
1354 void MainFrame::SaveWindowState()
1355 {
1356  DoCheckCurrentLayoutForChanges(false);
1357 
1358  // first delete all previous layouts, otherwise they might remain
1359  // if the new amount of layouts is less than the previous, because only the first layouts will be overwritten
1360  wxArrayString subs = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->EnumerateSubPaths(_T("/main_frame/layout"));
1361  for (size_t i = 0; i < subs.GetCount(); ++i)
1362  {
1363  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->DeleteSubPath(_T("/main_frame/layout/") + subs[i]);
1364  }
1365 
1366  int count = 0;
1367  for (LayoutViewsMap::iterator it = m_LayoutViews.begin(); it != m_LayoutViews.end(); ++it)
1368  {
1369  if (it->first.IsEmpty())
1370  continue;
1371  ++count;
1372  wxString key = wxString::Format(_T("/main_frame/layout/view%d/"), count);
1373  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(key + _T("name"), it->first);
1374  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(key + _T("data"), it->second);
1375 
1376  if (!m_LayoutMessagePane[it->first].IsEmpty())
1377  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(key + _T("dataMessagePane"), m_LayoutMessagePane[it->first]);
1378  }
1379 
1380  // save manager and messages selected page
1381  if (m_pPrjManUI->GetNotebook())
1382  {
1383  int selection = m_pPrjManUI->GetNotebook()->GetSelection();
1384  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(_T("/main_frame/layout/left_block_selection"), selection);
1385  }
1386  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(_T("/main_frame/layout/bottom_block_selection"), m_pInfoPane->GetSelection());
1387 
1388  // save display, window size and position
1389  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(_T("/main_frame/layout/display"), wxDisplay::GetFromWindow(this));
1390  if (!IsMaximized() && !IsIconized())
1391  {
1392  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(_T("/main_frame/layout/left"), GetPosition().x);
1393  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(_T("/main_frame/layout/top"), GetPosition().y);
1394  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(_T("/main_frame/layout/width"), GetSize().x);
1395  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(_T("/main_frame/layout/height"), GetSize().y);
1396  }
1397  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(_T("/main_frame/layout/maximized"), IsMaximized());
1398 }
1399 
1400 void MainFrame::LoadViewLayout(const wxString& name, bool isTemp)
1401 {
1402  if (m_LastLayoutName != name && !DoCheckCurrentLayoutForChanges(true))
1403  return;
1404 
1405  m_LastLayoutIsTemp = isTemp;
1406 
1407  wxString layout = m_LayoutViews[name];
1408  wxString layoutMP = m_LayoutMessagePane[name];
1409  if (layoutMP.IsEmpty())
1410  layoutMP = m_LayoutMessagePane[gDefaultLayout];
1411  if (layout.IsEmpty())
1412  {
1413  layout = m_LayoutViews[gDefaultLayout];
1414  SaveViewLayout(name, layout, layoutMP, false);
1415  DoSelectLayout(name);
1416  }
1417  else
1418  DoSelectLayout(name);
1419 
1420  // first load taborder of MessagePane, so LoadPerspective can restore the last selected tab
1421  m_pInfoPane->LoadTabOrder(layoutMP);
1422  m_LayoutManager.LoadPerspective(layout, false);
1423 
1424  DoUpdateLayout();
1425 
1426  m_PreviousLayoutName = m_LastLayoutName;
1427  m_LastLayoutName = name;
1428  m_LastLayoutData = layout;
1429  m_LastMessagePaneLayoutData = layoutMP;
1430 
1431  CodeBlocksLayoutEvent evt(cbEVT_SWITCHED_VIEW_LAYOUT);
1432  evt.layout = name;
1433  Manager::Get()->ProcessEvent(evt);
1434 }
1435 
1436 void MainFrame::SaveViewLayout(const wxString& name, const wxString& layout, const wxString& layoutMP, bool select)
1437 {
1438  if (name.IsEmpty())
1439  return;
1440  m_LayoutViews[name] = layout;
1441  m_LayoutMessagePane[name] = layoutMP;
1442  wxMenu* viewLayouts = nullptr;
1443  GetMenuBar()->FindItem(idViewLayoutSave, &viewLayouts);
1444  if (viewLayouts && viewLayouts->FindItem(name) == wxNOT_FOUND)
1445  {
1446  int id = wxNewId();
1447  viewLayouts->InsertCheckItem(viewLayouts->GetMenuItemCount() - 3, id, name, wxString::Format(_("Switch to %s perspective"), name.wx_str()));
1448  Connect( id, wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,
1449  (wxObjectEventFunction)(wxEventFunction)(wxCommandEventFunction)&MainFrame::OnViewLayout);
1450  m_PluginIDsMap[id] = name;
1451  }
1452  if (select)
1453  {
1454  DoSelectLayout(name);
1455  m_LastLayoutName = name;
1456  }
1457 }
1458 
1459 bool MainFrame::LayoutDifferent(const wxString& layout1,const wxString& layout2,const wxString& delimiter)
1460 {
1461  wxStringTokenizer strTok;
1462  unsigned long j;
1463 
1464  strTok.SetString(layout1, delimiter);
1465  wxArrayString arLayout1;
1466  while(strTok.HasMoreTokens())
1467  {
1468  wxStringTokenizer strTokColon(strTok.GetNextToken(), _T(";"));
1469  while(strTokColon.HasMoreTokens())
1470  {
1471  wxString theToken = strTokColon.GetNextToken();
1472  if (theToken.StartsWith(_T("state=")))
1473  {
1474  theToken=theToken.Right(theToken.Len() - wxString(_T("state=")).Len());
1475  theToken.ToULong(&j);
1476  // we filter out the hidden/show state
1477  theToken=wxString::Format(_("state=%lu"),j & wxAuiPaneInfo::optionHidden);
1478  }
1479  arLayout1.Add(theToken);
1480  }
1481  }
1482 
1483  strTok.SetString(layout2, delimiter);
1484  wxArrayString arLayout2;
1485  while(strTok.HasMoreTokens())
1486  {
1487  wxStringTokenizer strTokColon(strTok.GetNextToken(), _T(";"));
1488  while(strTokColon.HasMoreTokens())
1489  {
1490  wxString theToken = strTokColon.GetNextToken();
1491  if (theToken.StartsWith(_T("state=")))
1492  {
1493  theToken=theToken.Right(theToken.Len() - wxString(_T("state=")).Len());
1494  theToken.ToULong(&j);
1495  // we filter out the hidden/show state
1496  theToken=wxString::Format(_("state=%lu"),j & wxAuiPaneInfo::optionHidden);
1497  }
1498  arLayout2.Add(theToken);
1499  }
1500  }
1501 
1502  arLayout1.Sort();
1503  arLayout2.Sort();
1504 
1505  return arLayout1 != arLayout2;
1506 }
1507 
1508 bool MainFrame::LayoutMessagePaneDifferent(const wxString& layout1,const wxString& layout2, bool checkSelection)
1509 {
1510  wxStringTokenizer strTok;
1511  wxArrayString arLayout1;
1512  wxArrayString arLayout2;
1513 
1514  strTok.SetString(layout1.BeforeLast('|'), _T(";"));
1515  while (strTok.HasMoreTokens())
1516  {
1517  arLayout1.Add(strTok.GetNextToken());
1518  }
1519 
1520  strTok.SetString(layout2.BeforeLast('|'), _T(";"));
1521  while (strTok.HasMoreTokens())
1522  {
1523  arLayout2.Add(strTok.GetNextToken());
1524  }
1525 
1526  if (checkSelection)
1527  {
1528  arLayout1.Add(layout1.AfterLast('|'));
1529  arLayout2.Add(layout2.AfterLast('|'));
1530  }
1531  arLayout1.Sort();
1532  arLayout2.Sort();
1533 
1534  return arLayout1 != arLayout2;
1535 }
1536 
1537 bool MainFrame::DoCheckCurrentLayoutForChanges(bool canCancel)
1538 {
1539  DoFixToolbarsLayout();
1540  wxString lastlayout = m_LayoutManager.SavePerspective();
1541  wxString lastmessagepanelayout = m_pInfoPane->SaveTabOrder();
1542  if (!m_LastLayoutName.IsEmpty() &&
1543  (LayoutDifferent(lastlayout, m_LastLayoutData) ||
1544  LayoutMessagePaneDifferent(lastmessagepanelayout, m_LastMessagePaneLayoutData, Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("message_manager"))->ReadBool(_T("/save_selection_change_in_mp"), true)) ))
1545  {
1546  AnnoyingDialog dlg(_("Layout changed"),
1547  wxString::Format(_("The perspective '%s' has changed. Do you want to save it?"), m_LastLayoutName.wx_str()),
1548  wxART_QUESTION,
1549  canCancel ? AnnoyingDialog::YES_NO_CANCEL : AnnoyingDialog::YES_NO,
1550  // partial fix for bug 18970 (fix is incomplete to prevent the user from saving 'rtCANCEL')
1551  canCancel ? AnnoyingDialog::rtYES : AnnoyingDialog::rtSAVE_CHOICE);
1552  switch (dlg.ShowModal())
1553  {
1554  case AnnoyingDialog::rtYES:
1555  SaveViewLayout(m_LastLayoutName, lastlayout, lastmessagepanelayout, false);
1556  break;
1557  case AnnoyingDialog::rtCANCEL:
1558  DoSelectLayout(m_LastLayoutName);
1559  return false;
1560  default:
1561  break;
1562  }
1563  }
1564  return true;
1565 }

1567 void MainFrame::DoFixToolbarsLayout()
1568 {
1569  // because the user might change the toolbar icons size, we must cater for it...
1570  wxAuiPaneInfoArray& panes = m_LayoutManager.GetAllPanes();
1571  for (size_t i = 0; i < panes.GetCount(); ++i)
1572  {
1573  wxAuiPaneInfo& info = panes[i];
1574  if (info.state & wxAuiPaneInfo::optionToolbar)
1575  {
1576  info.best_size = info.window->GetBestSize();
1577  info.floating_size = wxDefaultSize;
1578  }
1579  }

1582 void MainFrame::DoSelectLayout(const wxString& name)
1583 {
1584  wxMenu* viewLayouts = nullptr;
1585  GetMenuBar()->FindItem(idViewLayoutSave, &viewLayouts);
1586  if (viewLayouts)
1587  {
1588  wxMenuItemList& items = viewLayouts->GetMenuItems();
1589  for (size_t i = 0; i < items.GetCount(); ++i)
1590  {
1591  if (!items[i]->IsCheckable())
1592  continue;
1593 #if wxCHECK_VERSION(3, 0, 0)
1594  items[i]->Check(items[i]->GetItemLabel().IsSameAs(name));
1595 #else
1596  items[i]->Check(items[i]->GetText().IsSameAs(name));
1597 #endif
1598  }
1599 
1600  if (!m_LastLayoutIsTemp)
1601  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->Write(_T("/main_frame/layout/default"), name);
1602  }
1603 }

1619 ToolbarInfo MainFrame::DoAddPluginToolbar(cbPlugin* plugin)
1620 {
1621  ToolbarInfo info;
1622  info.toolbar = Manager::Get()->CreateEmptyToolbar();
1623  if (plugin->BuildToolBar(info.toolbar))
1624  {
1625  info.priority = plugin->GetToolBarPriority();
1626  SetToolBar(nullptr);
1627  InitToolbar(info.toolbar);
1628 
1629  // add View->Toolbars menu item for toolbar
1630  wxMenu* viewToolbars = nullptr;
1631  GetMenuBar()->FindItem(idViewToolMain, &viewToolbars);
1632  if (viewToolbars)
1633  {
1634  wxMenuItem* item = AddPluginInMenus(viewToolbars, plugin,
1635  (wxObjectEventFunction)(wxEventFunction)(wxCommandEventFunction)&MainFrame::OnToggleBar,
1636  -1, true);
1637  if (item)
1638  {
1639  item->Check(true);
1640  m_PluginsTools[plugin] = info.toolbar;
1641  }
1642  }
1643 
1644  const PluginInfo* pluginInfo = Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->GetPluginInfo(plugin);
1645  if (!pluginInfo)
1646  cbThrow(_T("No plugin info?!?"));
1647 
1648  info.paneInfo.Name(pluginInfo->name + _T("Toolbar")).Caption(pluginInfo->title + _(" Toolbar"));
1649  }
1650  else
1651  {
1652  delete info.toolbar;
1653  info.toolbar = nullptr;
1654  }
1655  return info;
1656 }
1657 
1658 void MainFrame::DoAddPlugin(cbPlugin* plugin)
1659 {
1660  //Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->DebugLog(_T("Adding plugin: %s"), plugin->GetInfo()->name.wx_str());
1661  AddPluginInHelpPluginsMenu(plugin);
1662  if (plugin->GetType() == ptTool)
1663  {
1664  AddPluginInPluginsMenu(plugin);
1665  }
1666  // offer menu and toolbar space for other plugins
1667  else
1668  {
1669  // menu
1670  try
1671  {
1672  wxMenuBar* mbar = GetMenuBar();
1673  plugin->BuildMenu(mbar);
1674  }
1675  catch (cbException& e)
1676  {
1677  e.ShowErrorMessage();
1678  }
1679  // Don't load the toolbars during the initial loading of the plugins, this code should be executed
1680  // only when a single plugins is loaded from the Plugins -> Manager ... window.
1681  if (!m_ScanningForPlugins)
1682  {
1683  // Create the toolbar for the plugin if there is one.
1684  const ToolbarInfo &toolbarInfo = DoAddPluginToolbar(plugin);
1685  if (toolbarInfo.toolbar)
1686  {
1687  // Place the new toolbar at the bottom of the toolbar pane. Try to reuse the last row
1688  // if there is enough space in it, otherwise place the new toolbar at a new row.
1689  int row = 0;
1690  const wxAuiPaneInfoArray &panes = m_LayoutManager.GetAllPanes();
1691  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < panes.GetCount(); ++ii)
1692  {
1693  const wxAuiPaneInfo &info = panes[ii];
1694  if (info.IsToolbar())
1695  row = std::max(row, info.dock_row);
1696  }
1697  int minX = 100000, maxX = -100000;
1698  int position = 0;
1699  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < panes.GetCount(); ++ii)
1700  {
1701  const wxAuiPaneInfo &info = panes[ii];
1702  if (info.IsToolbar() && info.dock_row == row && info.window)
1703  {
1704  const wxPoint &pt = info.window->GetPosition();
1705  minX = std::min(minX, pt.x + info.window->GetSize().x);
1706  maxX = std::max(maxX, pt.x + info.window->GetSize().x);
1707  position = std::max(position, info.dock_pos);
1708  }
1709  }
1710  if (maxX + toolbarInfo.toolbar->GetSize().x <= GetSize().x)
1711  position++;
1712  else
1713  {
1714  row++;
1715  position = 0;
1716  }
1717  wxAuiPaneInfo paneInfo(toolbarInfo.paneInfo);
1718  m_LayoutManager.AddPane(toolbarInfo.toolbar, paneInfo. ToolbarPane().Top().Row(row).Position(position));
1719  // Add the event handler for mouse right click
1720  toolbarInfo.toolbar->Connect(wxID_ANY, wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOL_RCLICKED,
1721  wxCommandEventHandler(MainFrame::OnToolBarRightClick), NULL, this);
1722 
1723  DoUpdateLayout();
1724  }
1725  }
1726  DoAddPluginStatusField(plugin);
1727  }
1728 }

1754 
1755 bool MainFrame::OpenGeneric(const wxString& filename, bool addToHistory)
1756 {
1757  if (filename.IsEmpty())
1758  return false;
1759 
1760  wxFileName fname(filename); fname.ClearExt(); fname.SetExt(_T("cbp"));
1761  switch ( FileTypeOf(filename) )
1762  {
1763  //
1764  // Workspace
1765  //
1766  case ftCodeBlocksWorkspace:
1767  // verify that it's not the same as the one already open
1768  if (filename == Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->GetWorkspace()->GetFilename())
1769  return true;
1770  else
1771  {
1772  if ( DoCloseCurrentWorkspace() )
1773  {
1774  wxBusyCursor wait; // loading a worspace can take some time -> showhourglass
1775  ShowHideStartPage(true); // hide startherepage, so we can use full tab-range
1776  bool ret = Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->LoadWorkspace(filename);
1777  if (!ret)
1778  ShowHideStartPage(); // show/hide startherepage, dependant of settings, if loading failed
1779  else if (addToHistory)
1780  m_projectsHistory.AddToHistory(Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->GetWorkspace()->GetFilename());
1781  return ret;
1782  }
1783  else
1784  return false;
1785  }
1786  break;
1787 
1788  //
1789  // Project
1790  //
1791  case ftCodeBlocksProject:
1792  {
1793  // Make a check whether the project exists in current workspace
1794  cbProject* prj = Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->IsOpen(fname.GetFullPath());
1795  if (!prj)
1796  {
1797  wxBusyCursor wait; // loading a workspace can take some time -> showhourglass
1798  return DoOpenProject(filename, addToHistory);
1799  }
1800  else
1801  {
1802  // NOTE (Morten#1#): A message here will prevent batch-builds from working and is shown sometimes even if correct
1803  Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->SetProject(prj, false);
1804  return true;
1805  }
1806  }
1807  //
1808  // Source files
1809  //
1810  case ftHeader:
1811  // fallthrough
1812  case ftSource:
1813  // fallthrough
1814  case ftTemplateSource:
1815  // fallthrough
1816  case ftResource:
1817  return DoOpenFile(filename, addToHistory);
1818  //
1819  // For all other files, ask MIME plugin for a suitable handler
1820  //
1821  default:
1822  {
1823  cbMimePlugin* plugin = Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->GetMIMEHandlerForFile(filename);
1824  // warn user that "Files extension handler" is disabled
1825  if (!plugin)
1826  {
1827  cbMessageBox(_("Could not open file ") + filename + _(",\nbecause no extension handler could be found."), _("Error"), wxICON_ERROR);
1828  return false;
1829  }
1830  if (plugin->OpenFile(filename) == 0)
1831  {
1832  m_filesHistory.AddToHistory(filename);
1833  return true;
1834  }
1835  return false;
1836  }
1837  }
1838  return true;
1839 }
1840 
1841 bool MainFrame::DoOpenProject(const wxString& filename, bool addToHistory)
1842 {
1843 // Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->DebugLog(_T("Opening project '%s'"), filename.wx_str());
1844  if (!wxFileExists(filename))
1845  {
1846  cbMessageBox(_("The project file does not exist..."), _("Error"), wxICON_ERROR);
1847  return false;
1848  }
1849 
1850  ShowHideStartPage(true); // hide startherepage, so we can use full tab-range
1851  cbProject* prj = Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->LoadProject(filename, true);
1852  if (prj)
1853  {
1854  if (addToHistory)
1855  m_projectsHistory.AddToHistory(prj->GetFilename());
1856  return true;
1857  }
1858  ShowHideStartPage(); // show/hide startherepage, dependant of settings, if loading failed
1859  return false;
1860 }

1862 bool MainFrame::DoOpenFile(const wxString& filename, bool addToHistory)

1865  if (ed)
1866  {
1867  // Cryogen 24/3/10 Activate the editor after opening. Partial fix for bug #14087.
1868  ed->Activate();
1869  if (addToHistory)
1870  m_filesHistory.AddToHistory(ed->GetFilename());
1871  return true;
1872  }
1873  return false;
1874 }

1881 void MainFrame::DoCreateStatusBar()
1882 {
1883  wxClientDC dc(this);
1884  wxFont font = dc.GetFont();
1885  int h;
1886  size_t num = 0;
1887 
1888  wxCoord width[16]; // 16 max
1889  width[num++] = -1; // main field
1890 
1891  dc.GetTextExtent(_(" Highlight Button "), &width[num++], &h);
1892  dc.GetTextExtent(_(" Windows (CR+LF) "), &width[num++], &h);
1893  dc.GetTextExtent(_(" WINDOWS-1252 "), &width[num++], &h);
1894  dc.GetTextExtent(_(" Line 12345, Column 123 "), &width[num++], &h);
1895  dc.GetTextExtent(_(" Overwrite "), &width[num++], &h);
1896  dc.GetTextExtent(_(" Modified "), &width[num++], &h);
1897  dc.GetTextExtent(_(" Read/Write "), &width[num++], &h);
1898  dc.GetTextExtent(_(" name_of_profile "), &width[num++], &h);
1899 
1900  wxStatusBar* sb = CreateStatusBar(num);
1901  if (!sb) return;
1902 
1903  SetStatusWidths(num, width);
1904 
1905  // Highlightbutton
1906  wxRect rect;
1907  if ( sb->GetFieldRect(1, rect) )
1908  {
1909  m_pHighlightButton = new wxButton(sb, idHighlightButton, wxEmptyString,
1910  rect.GetPosition(), rect.GetSize(),
1911  wxNO_BORDER|wxBU_LEFT);
1912  }
1913 }
1914 
1915 void MainFrame::DoUpdateStatusBar()
1916 {
1917  if (!GetStatusBar())
1918  return;
1919 
1920  cbEditor* ed = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetBuiltinActiveEditor();
1921  wxString personality(Manager::Get()->GetPersonalityManager()->GetPersonality());
1922  if (ed)
1923  {
1924  int panel = 0;
1925  int pos = ed->GetControl()->GetCurrentPos();
1926  wxString msg;
1927  SetStatusText(ed->GetFilename(), panel++);
1928 
1929  // Highlightbutton
1930  if (m_pHighlightButton)
1931  {
1932  EditorColourSet* colour_set = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetColourSet();
1933  if (colour_set)
1934  m_pHighlightButton->SetLabel(colour_set->GetLanguageName(ed->GetLanguage()));
1935  else
1936  m_pHighlightButton->SetLabel(wxEmptyString);
1937  }
1938  // EOL mode
1939  panel++;
1940  switch (ed->GetControl()->GetEOLMode())
1941  {
1942  case wxSCI_EOL_CRLF: msg = _T("Windows (CR+LF)"); break;
1943  case wxSCI_EOL_CR: msg = _T("Mac (CR)"); break;
1944  case wxSCI_EOL_LF: msg = _T("Unix (LF)"); break;
1945  default: break;
1946  }
1947  SetStatusText(msg, panel++);
1948  SetStatusText(ed->GetEncodingName(), panel++);
1949  msg.Printf(_("Line %d, Column %d"), ed->GetControl()->GetCurrentLine() + 1, ed->GetControl()->GetColumn(pos) + 1);
1950  SetStatusText(msg, panel++);
1951  SetStatusText(ed->GetControl()->GetOvertype() ? _("Overwrite") : _("Insert"), panel++);
1952 #if wxCHECK_VERSION(3, 0, 0)
1953  SetStatusText(ed->GetModified() ? _("Modified") : _T(""), panel++);
1954 #else
1955  SetStatusText(ed->GetModified() ? _("Modified") : wxEmptyString, panel++);
1956 #endif
1957  SetStatusText(ed->GetControl()->GetReadOnly() ? _("Read only") : _("Read/Write"), panel++);
1958  SetStatusText(personality, panel++);
1959  }
1960  else
1961  {
1962  int panel = 0;
1963  EditorBase *eb = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetActiveEditor();
1964  if ( eb )
1965  SetStatusText(eb->GetFilename(), panel++);
1966  else
1967  SetStatusText(_("Welcome to ") + appglobals::AppName + _T("!"), panel++);
1968 
1969  // Highlightbutton
1970  if (m_pHighlightButton)
1971  m_pHighlightButton->SetLabel(wxEmptyString);
1972  panel++;
1973 
1974  SetStatusText(wxEmptyString, panel++);
1975  SetStatusText(wxEmptyString, panel++);
1976  SetStatusText(wxEmptyString, panel++);
1977  SetStatusText(wxEmptyString, panel++);
1978  SetStatusText(wxEmptyString, panel++);
1979  SetStatusText(wxEmptyString, panel++);
1980  SetStatusText(personality, panel++);
1981  }
1982 }

1984 void MainFrame::DoUpdateEditorStyle(cbAuiNotebook* target, const wxString& prefix, long defaultStyle)
1985 {
1986  if (!target)
1987  return;
1988 
1989  ConfigManager* cfg = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"));
1990  target->SetTabCtrlHeight(1);
1991 
1992  long nbstyle = cfg->ReadInt(_T("/environment/tabs_style"), 0);
1993  switch (nbstyle)
1994  {
1995  case 1: // simple style
1996  target->SetArtProvider(new wxAuiSimpleTabArt());
1997  break;
1998 
1999  case 2: // VC 7.1 style
2000  target->SetArtProvider(new NbStyleVC71());
2001  break;
2002 
2003  case 3: // Firefox 2 style
2004  target->SetArtProvider(new NbStyleFF2());
2005  break;
2006 
2007  default: // default style
2008  #if defined(__WXGTK__) && (USE_GTK_NOTEBOOK) && !wxCHECK_VERSION(3, 0, 0)
2009  target->SetArtProvider(new NbStyleGTK());
2010  #else
2011  target->SetArtProvider(new wxAuiDefaultTabArt());
2012  #endif
2013  break;
2014  }
2015 
2016  target->SetTabCtrlHeight(-1);
2017 
2018  nbstyle = defaultStyle;
2019  if (cfg->ReadBool(_T("/environment/") + prefix + _T("_tabs_bottom")))
2020  nbstyle |= wxAUI_NB_BOTTOM;
2021 
2022  if (cfg->ReadBool(_T("/environment/tabs_list")))
2023  nbstyle |= wxAUI_NB_WINDOWLIST_BUTTON;
2024 
2025  target->SetWindowStyleFlag(nbstyle);
2026 }

2028 void MainFrame::DoUpdateEditorStyle()
2029 {
2030  long style = wxAUI_NB_TAB_SPLIT | wxAUI_NB_TAB_MOVE | wxAUI_NB_SCROLL_BUTTONS | wxAUI_NB_MIDDLE_CLICK_CLOSE;
2031  long closestyle = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadInt(_T("/environment/tabs_closestyle"), 0);
2032  switch (closestyle)
2033  {
2034  case 1: // current tab
2035  style |= wxAUI_NB_CLOSE_ON_ACTIVE_TAB;
2036  break;
2037 
2038  case 2: // right side
2039  style |= wxAUI_NB_CLOSE_BUTTON;
2040  break;
2041 
2042  default: // all tabs (default)
2043  style |= wxAUI_NB_CLOSE_ON_ALL_TABS;
2044  break;
2045  }
2046 
2047  cbAuiNotebook* an = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetNotebook();
2048 
2049  DoUpdateEditorStyle(an, _T("editor"), style | wxNO_FULL_REPAINT_ON_RESIZE | wxCLIP_CHILDREN);
2050  if (Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadBool(_T("/environment/hide_editor_tabs"),false))
2051  an->SetTabCtrlHeight(0);
2052 
2053  an = m_pInfoPane;
2054  DoUpdateEditorStyle(an, _T("infopane"), style);
2055 
2056  an = m_pPrjManUI->GetNotebook();
2057  DoUpdateEditorStyle(an, _T("project"), wxAUI_NB_SCROLL_BUTTONS | wxAUI_NB_TAB_MOVE);
2058 }

2060 void MainFrame::DoUpdateLayoutColours()
2061 {
2062  ConfigManager* cfg = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"));
2063  wxAuiDockArt* art = m_LayoutManager.GetArtProvider();
2064 
2065 #ifndef __WXGTK__

2094 void MainFrame::DoUpdateAppTitle()
2095 {
2096  EditorBase* ed = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager() ? Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetActiveEditor() : nullptr;
2097  cbProject* prj = nullptr;
2098  if (ed && ed->IsBuiltinEditor())
2099  {
2100  ProjectFile* prjf = ((cbEditor*)ed)->GetProjectFile();
2101  if (prjf)
2102  prj = prjf->GetParentProject();
2103  }
2104  else
2105  prj = Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager() ? Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->GetActiveProject() : nullptr;
2106  wxString projname;
2107  wxString edname;
2108  wxString fulltitle;
2109  if (ed || prj)
2110  {
2111  if (prj)
2112  {
2113  if (Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->GetActiveProject() == prj)
2114  projname = wxString(_T(" [")) + prj->GetTitle() + _T("]");
2115  else
2116  projname = wxString(_T(" (")) + prj->GetTitle() + _T(")");
2117  }
2118  if (ed)
2119  edname = ed->GetTitle();
2120  fulltitle = edname + projname;
2121  if (!fulltitle.IsEmpty())
2122  fulltitle.Append(_T(" - "));
2123  }
2124  fulltitle.Append(appglobals::AppName);
2125  fulltitle.Append(_T(" "));
2126  fulltitle.Append(appglobals::AppVersion);
2127  SetTitle(fulltitle);
2128 }

2130 void MainFrame::ShowHideStartPage(bool forceHasProject, int forceState)
2131 {
2132 // Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->LogWarning(_("Toggling start page"));
2133  if (Manager::IsBatchBuild())
2134  return;
2135 
2136  // we use the 'forceHasProject' param because when a project is opened
2137  // the EVT_PROJECT_OPEN event is fired *before* ProjectManager::GetProjects()
2138  // and ProjectManager::GetActiveProject() are updated...
2139 
2140  if (m_InitiatedShutdown)
2141  {
2142  EditorBase* sh = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetEditor(g_StartHereTitle);
2143  if (sh)
2144  sh->Destroy();
2145  return;
2146  }
2147 
2148  bool show = !forceHasProject &&
2149  Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->GetProjects()->GetCount() == 0 &&
2150  Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadBool(_T("/environment/start_here_page"), true);
2151 
2152  if (forceState<0)
2153  show = false;
2154  if (forceState>0)
2155  show = true;
2156 
2157  EditorBase* sh = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetEditor(g_StartHereTitle);
2158  if (show)
2159  {
2160  if (!sh)
2161  {
2162  sh = new StartHerePage(this, m_projectsHistory, m_filesHistory,
2163  Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetNotebook());
2164  }
2165  else
2166  static_cast<StartHerePage*>(sh)->Reload();
2167  }
2168  else if (!show && sh)
2169  sh->Destroy();
2170 
2171  DoUpdateAppTitle();
2172 }

2184 void MainFrame::OnStartHereLink(wxCommandEvent& event)
2185 {
2186  wxCommandEvent evt;
2187  evt.SetId(idFileNewProject);
2188  wxString link = event.GetString();
2189  if (link.IsSameAs(_T("CB_CMD_NEW_PROJECT")))
2190  OnFileNewWhat(evt);
2191  else if (link.IsSameAs(_T("CB_CMD_OPEN_PROJECT")))
2192  DoOnFileOpen(true);
2193 // else if (link.IsSameAs(_T("CB_CMD_CONF_ENVIRONMENT")))
2194 // OnSettingsEnvironment(evt);
2195 // else if (link.IsSameAs(_T("CB_CMD_CONF_EDITOR")))
2196 // Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->Configure();
2197 // else if (link.IsSameAs(_T("CB_CMD_CONF_COMPILER")))
2198 // OnSettingsCompilerDebugger(evt);
2199  else if (link.StartsWith(_T("CB_CMD_OPEN_HISTORY_")))
2200  {
2201  RecentItemsList *recent;
2202  recent = link.StartsWith(_T("CB_CMD_OPEN_HISTORY_PROJECT_")) ? &m_projectsHistory : &m_filesHistory;
2203  unsigned long item;
2204  link.AfterLast(_T('_')).ToULong(&item);
2205  --item;
2206  const wxString &filename = recent->GetHistoryFile(item);
2207  if (!filename.empty())
2208  {
2209  if ( !OpenGeneric(filename, true) )
2210  recent->AskToRemoveFileFromHistory(item);
2211  }
2212  }
2213  else if (link.StartsWith(_T("CB_CMD_DELETE_HISTORY_")))
2214  {
2215  RecentItemsList *recent;
2216  recent = link.StartsWith(_T("CB_CMD_DELETE_HISTORY_PROJECT_")) ? &m_projectsHistory : &m_filesHistory;
2217  unsigned long item;
2218  link.AfterLast(_T('_')).ToULong(&item);
2219  --item;
2220  recent->AskToRemoveFileFromHistory(item, false);
2221  }
2222  else if (link.IsSameAs(_T("CB_CMD_TIP_OF_THE_DAY")))
2223  ShowTips(true);
2224 }

2294 void MainFrame::OnFileNewWhat(wxCommandEvent& event)
2295 {
2296  int id = event.GetId();
2297  if (id != idFileNewEmpty)
2298  {
2299  // wizard-based
2300 
2301  TemplateOutputType tot = totProject;
2302  if (id == idFileNewProject) tot = totProject;
2303  else if (id == idFileNewTarget) tot = totTarget;
2304  else if (id == idFileNewFile) tot = totFiles;
2305  else if (id == idFileNewCustom) tot = totCustom;
2306  else if (id == idFileNewUser) tot = totUser;
2307  else return;
2308 
2309  wxString filename;
2310  cbProject* prj = TemplateManager::Get()->New(tot, &filename);
2311  // verify that the open files are still in sync
2312  // the new file might have overwritten an existing one)
2313  Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->CheckForExternallyModifiedFiles();
2314 
2315  // If both are empty it means that the wizard has failed
2316  if (!prj && filename.IsEmpty())
2317  return;
2318 
2319  // Send the new project event
2320  CodeBlocksEvent evtNew(cbEVT_PROJECT_NEW, 0, prj);
2321  Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->NotifyPlugins(evtNew);
2322 
2323  if (prj)
2324  {
2325  prj->Save();
2326  prj->SaveAllFiles();
2327  }
2328 
2329  if (!filename.IsEmpty())
2330  {
2331  if (prj)
2332  m_projectsHistory.AddToHistory(filename);
2333  else
2334  m_filesHistory.AddToHistory(filename);
2335  }
2336  if (prj && tot == totProject) // Created project should be parsed
2337  {
2338  CodeBlocksEvent evtOpen(cbEVT_PROJECT_OPEN, 0, prj);
2339  Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->NotifyPlugins(evtOpen);
2340  }
2341  return;
2342  }
2343 
2344  // new empty file quick shortcut code below
2345 
2346  cbProject* project = Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->GetActiveProject();
2347  if (project)
2348  wxSetWorkingDirectory(project->GetBasePath());
2349  cbEditor* ed = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->New();
2350 
2351  // initially start change-collection if configured on empty files
2352  if (ed)
2353  ed->GetControl()->SetChangeCollection(Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("editor"))->ReadBool(_T("/margin/use_changebar"), true));
2354 
2355  if (ed && ed->IsOK())
2356  m_filesHistory.AddToHistory(ed->GetFilename());
2357 
2358  if (!ed || !project)
2359  return;
2360 
2361  wxString oldname = ed->GetFilename();
2362  if (cbMessageBox(_("Do you want to add this new file in the active project (has to be saved first)?"),
2363  _("Add file to project"),
2364  wxYES_NO | wxICON_QUESTION) == wxID_YES &&
2365  ed->SaveAs() && ed->IsOK())
2366  {
2367  wxArrayInt targets;
2368  if (Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager()->AddFileToProject(ed->GetFilename(), project, targets) != 0)
2369  {
2370  ProjectFile* pf = project->GetFileByFilename(ed->GetFilename(), false);
2371  ed->SetProjectFile(pf);
2372  m_pPrjManUI->RebuildTree();
2373  }
2374  }
2375  // verify that the open files are still in sync
2376  // the new file might have overwritten an existing one)
2377  Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->CheckForExternallyModifiedFiles();
2378 }
2379 
2380 bool MainFrame::OnDropFiles(wxCoord /*x*/, wxCoord /*y*/, const wxArrayString& files)
2381 {
2382  bool success = true; // Safe case initialisation
2383 
2384  // first check to see if a workspace is passed. If so, only this will be loaded
2385  wxString foundWorkspace;
2386  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < files.GetCount(); ++i)
2387  {
2388  FileType ft = FileTypeOf(files[i]);
2389  if (ft == ftCodeBlocksWorkspace || ft == ftMSVC6Workspace || ft == ftMSVC7Workspace)
2390  {
2391  foundWorkspace = files[i];
2392  break;
2393  }
2394  }
2395 
2396  if (!foundWorkspace.IsEmpty())
2397  success &= OpenGeneric(foundWorkspace);
2398  else
2399  {
2400  wxBusyCursor useless;
2401  wxPaintEvent e;
2402  ProcessEvent(e);
2403  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < files.GetCount(); ++i)
2404  success &= OpenGeneric(files[i]);
2405  }
2406  return success;
2407 }

2409 void MainFrame::OnFileNew(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
2410 {
2411  wxMenu* popup = nullptr;
2412  wxMenuBar* bar = GetMenuBar();
2413  if (!bar)
2414  return;
2415 
2416  bar->FindItem(idFileNewProject, &popup);
2417  if (popup)
2418  {
2419  popup = CopyMenu(popup);
2420  if (popup)
2421  {
2422  PopupMenu(popup); // this will lead us in OnFileNewWhat() - the meat is there ;)
2423  delete popup;
2424  }
2425  }
2426 }
2427 
2428 // in case we are opening a project (bProject == true) we do not want to interfere
2429 // with 'last type of files' (probably the call was open (existing) project on the
2430 // start here page --> so we know it's a project --> set the filter accordingly
2431 // but as said don't force the 'last used type of files' to change, that should
2432 // only change when an open file is carried out (so (source) file <---> project (file) )
2433 // TODO : when regular file open and user manually sets filter to project files --> will change
2434 // the last type : is that expected behaviour ???
2435 void MainFrame::DoOnFileOpen(bool bProject)
2436 {
2437  wxString Filters = FileFilters::GetFilterString();
2438  // the value returned by GetIndexForFilterAll() is updated by GetFilterString()
2439  int StoredIndex = FileFilters::GetIndexForFilterAll();
2440  wxString Path;
2441  ConfigManager* mgr = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"));
2442  if (mgr)
2443  {
2444  if (!bProject)
2445  {
2446  wxString Filter = mgr->Read(_T("/file_dialogs/file_new_open/filter"));
2447  if (!Filter.IsEmpty())
2448  FileFilters::GetFilterIndexFromName(Filters, Filter, StoredIndex);
2449  Path = mgr->Read(_T("/file_dialogs/file_new_open/directory"), Path);
2450  }
2451  else
2452  FileFilters::GetFilterIndexFromName(Filters, _("Code::Blocks project/workspace files"), StoredIndex);
2453  }
2454  wxFileDialog dlg(this,
2455  _("Open file"),
2456  Path,
2457  wxEmptyString,
2458  Filters,
2459  wxFD_OPEN | wxFD_MULTIPLE | compatibility::wxHideReadonly);
2460  dlg.SetFilterIndex(StoredIndex);
2461 
2462  PlaceWindow(&dlg);
2463  if (dlg.ShowModal() == wxID_OK)
2464  {
2465  // store the last used filter and directory
2466  // as said : don't do this in case of an 'open project'
2467  if (mgr && !bProject)
2468  {
2469  int Index = dlg.GetFilterIndex();
2470  wxString Filter;
2471  if (FileFilters::GetFilterNameFromIndex(Filters, Index, Filter))
2472  mgr->Write(_T("/file_dialogs/file_new_open/filter"), Filter);
2473  wxString Test = dlg.GetDirectory();
2474  mgr->Write(_T("/file_dialogs/file_new_open/directory"), dlg.GetDirectory());
2475  }
2476  wxArrayString files;
2477  dlg.GetPaths(files);
2478  OnDropFiles(0,0,files);
2479  }
2480 }

2724 void MainFrame::OnApplicationClose(wxCloseEvent& event)
2725 {
2726  if (m_InitiatedShutdown)
2727  return;
2728 
2729  CodeBlocksEvent evt(cbEVT_APP_START_SHUTDOWN);
2730  Manager::Get()->ProcessEvent(evt);
2731  Manager::Yield();
2732 
2733  m_InitiatedShutdown = true;
2734  Manager::BlockYields(true);
2735 
2736  ProjectManager* prjman = Manager::Get()->GetProjectManager();
2737  if (prjman)
2738  {
2739  cbProject* prj = prjman->GetActiveProject();
2740  if (prj && prj->GetCurrentlyCompilingTarget())
2741  {
2742  event.Veto();
2743  wxBell();
2744  m_InitiatedShutdown = false;
2745  Manager::BlockYields(false);
2746  return;
2747  }
2748  }
2749  if (!ProjectManager::CanShutdown() || !EditorManager::CanShutdown())
2750  {
2751  event.Veto();
2752  wxBell();
2753  m_InitiatedShutdown = false;
2754  Manager::BlockYields(false);
2755  return;
2756  }
2757 
2758  if (!DoCloseCurrentWorkspace())
2759  {
2760  event.Veto();
2761  m_InitiatedShutdown = false;
2762  Manager::BlockYields(false);
2763  return;
2764  }
2765 
2766  Manager::SetAppShuttingDown(true);
2767 
2768  Manager::Get()->GetLogManager()->DebugLog(_T("Deinitializing plugins..."));
2769  CodeBlocksEvent evtShutdown(cbEVT_APP_START_SHUTDOWN);
2770  Manager::Get()->ProcessEvent(evtShutdown);
2771  Manager::Yield();
2772 
2773  if (!Manager::IsBatchBuild())
2774  SaveWindowState();
2775 
2776  if (m_pPrjManUI->GetNotebook())
2777  m_LayoutManager.DetachPane(m_pPrjManUI->GetNotebook());
2778  m_LayoutManager.DetachPane(m_pInfoPane);
2779  m_LayoutManager.DetachPane(Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetNotebook());
2780 
2781  m_LayoutManager.UnInit();
2782  TerminateRecentFilesHistory();
2783 
2784  // remove all other event handlers from this window
2785  // this stops it from crashing, when no plugins are loaded
2786  while (GetEventHandler() != this)
2787  PopEventHandler(false);
2788 
2789  // Hide the window
2790  Hide();
2791 
2792  if (!Manager::IsBatchBuild())
2793  {
2794  m_pInfoPane->Destroy();
2795  m_pInfoPane = nullptr;
2796  }
2797 
2798  // Disconnect the mouse right click event handler for toolbars, this should be done before the plugin is
2799  // unloaded in Manager::Shutdown().
2800  PluginToolbarsMap::iterator it;
2801  for( it = m_PluginsTools.begin(); it != m_PluginsTools.end(); ++it )
2802  {
2803  wxToolBar* toolbar = it->second;
2804  if (toolbar)//Disconnect the mouse right click event handler before the toolbar is destroyed
2805  {
2806  bool result = toolbar->Disconnect(wxID_ANY, wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOL_RCLICKED, wxCommandEventHandler(MainFrame::OnToolBarRightClick));
2807  cbAssert(result);
2808  }
2809  }
2810 
2811  Manager::Shutdown(); // Shutdown() is not Free(), Manager is automatically destroyed at exit
2812 
2813  Destroy();
2814 }

3016 void MainFrame::OnEditLinePaste(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
3017 {
3018  cbEditor* ed = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetBuiltinActiveEditor();
3019  if (ed)
3020  {
3021  //We want to undo all in one step
3022  ed->GetControl()->BeginUndoAction();
3023 
3024  int pos = ed->GetControl()->GetCurrentPos();
3025  int line = ed->GetControl()->LineFromPosition(pos);
3026  ed->GetControl()->GotoLine(line);
3027  int column = pos - ed->GetControl()->GetCurrentPos();
3028  ed->GetControl()->Paste();
3029  pos = ed->GetControl()->GetCurrentPos();
3030  ed->GetControl()->GotoPos(pos+column);
3031 
3032  ed->GetControl()->EndUndoAction();
3033  }
3034 }

3036 void MainFrame::OnEditLineMove(wxCommandEvent& event)
3037 {
3038  cbEditor* ed = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetBuiltinActiveEditor();
3039  if (!ed)
3040  return;
3041 
3042  // TODO (mortenmacfly##): Exclude rectangle selection here or not? What behaviour the majority of users expect here???
3043  cbStyledTextCtrl* stc = ed->GetControl();
3044  if (!stc || /*stc->SelectionIsRectangle() ||*/ (stc->GetSelections() > 1))
3045  return;
3046  if (stc->GetLineCount() < 3) // why are you trying to move lines anyways?
3047  return;
3048 
3049  // note that these function calls are a much simpler, however
3050  // they cause text to unnecessarily be marked as modified
3051 // if (event.GetId() == idEditLineUp)
3052 // stc->MoveSelectedLinesUp();
3053 // else
3054 // stc->MoveSelectedLinesDown();
3055 
3056  int startPos = stc->PositionFromLine(stc->LineFromPosition(stc->GetSelectionStart()));
3057  int endPos = stc->LineFromPosition(stc->GetSelectionEnd()); // is line
3058  if ( stc->GetSelectionEnd() == stc->PositionFromLine(endPos) // end is in first column
3059  && stc->PositionFromLine(endPos) != stc->GetLineEndPosition(endPos) // this line has text
3060  && endPos > stc->LineFromPosition(startPos) ) // start and end are on different lines
3061  {
3062  --endPos; // do not unexpectedly select another line
3063  }
3064  const bool isLastLine = (endPos == stc->GetLineCount() - 1);
3065  // warning: stc->GetLineEndPosition(endPos) yields strange results for CR LF (see bug 18892)
3066  endPos = ( isLastLine ? stc->GetLineEndPosition(endPos)
3067  : stc->PositionFromLine(endPos + 1) - 1 ); // is position
3068  if (event.GetId() == idEditLineUp)
3069  {
3070  if (stc->LineFromPosition(startPos) < 1)
3071  return; // cannot move up (we are at the top), exit
3072  stc->BeginUndoAction();
3073  const int offset = (isLastLine ? startPos - stc->GetLineEndPosition(stc->LineFromPosition(startPos) - 1) : 0);
3074  const int lineLength = startPos - stc->PositionFromLine(stc->LineFromPosition(startPos) - 1);
3075  const wxString line = stc->GetTextRange(startPos - lineLength - offset,
3076  startPos - offset);
3077  stc->InsertText(endPos + (isLastLine ? 0 : 1), line);
3078  // warning: line.Length() != lineLength if multibyte characters are used
3079  stc->DeleteRange(startPos - lineLength, lineLength);
3080  startPos -= lineLength;
3081  endPos -= lineLength;
3082  stc->EndUndoAction();
3083  }
3084  else // event.GetId() == idEditLineDown
3085  {
3086  if (isLastLine)
3087  return; // cannot move down (we are at the bottom), exit
3088  stc->BeginUndoAction();
3089  const int lineLength = stc->PositionFromLine(stc->LineFromPosition(endPos + 1) + 1) - endPos - 1;
3090  const wxString line = stc->GetTextRange(endPos + 1,
3091  endPos + 1 + lineLength);
3092  stc->InsertText(startPos, line);
3093  // warning: line.Length() != lineLength if multibyte characters are used
3094  startPos += lineLength;
3095  endPos += lineLength;
3096  stc->DeleteRange(endPos + 1, lineLength);
3097  stc->EndUndoAction();
3098  }
3099  stc->SetSelectionVoid(startPos, endPos);
3100 }

3148 namespace
3149 {
3150 
3151 struct EditorSelection
3152 {
3153  long caret, anchor;
3154 
3155  bool Empty() const { return caret == anchor; }
3156  bool IsReversed() const { return caret < anchor; }
3157 
3158  long GetStart() const { return std::min(caret, anchor); }
3159  long GetEnd() const { return std::max(caret, anchor); }
3160 
3161  bool Contains(const EditorSelection &selection) const
3162  {
3163  return !(GetEnd() < selection.GetStart() || GetStart() > selection.GetEnd());
3164  }
3165 };
3166 
3167 void SelectNext(cbStyledTextCtrl *control, const wxString &selectedText, long selectionEnd, bool reversed)
3168 {
3169  // always match case and try to match whole words if they have no special characters
3170  int flag = wxSCI_FIND_MATCHCASE;
3171  if (selectedText.find_first_of(wxT(";:\"'`~@#$%^,-+*/\\=|!?&*(){}[]")) == wxString::npos)
3172  flag |= wxSCI_FIND_WHOLEWORD;
3173 
3174  int lengthFound = 0; // we need this to work properly with multibyte characters
3175  int eof = control->GetLength();
3176  int pos = control->FindText(selectionEnd, eof, selectedText, flag, &lengthFound);
3177  if (pos != wxSCI_INVALID_POSITION)
3178  {
3179  control->SetAdditionalSelectionTyping(true);
3180  control->IndicatorClearRange(pos, lengthFound);
3181  if (reversed)
3182  control->AddSelection(pos, pos + lengthFound);
3183  else
3184  control->AddSelection(pos + lengthFound, pos);
3185  control->MakeNearbyLinesVisible(control->LineFromPosition(pos));
3186  }
3187  else
3188  InfoWindow::Display(_("Select Next Occurrence"), _("No more available"));
3189 }
3190 
3191 bool GetSelectionInEditor(EditorSelection &selection, cbStyledTextCtrl *control)
3192 {
3193  int main = control->GetMainSelection();
3194  int count = control->GetSelections();
3195  if (main >=0 && main < count)
3196  {
3197  selection.caret = control->GetSelectionNCaret(main);
3198  selection.anchor = control->GetSelectionNAnchor(main);
3199  return true;
3200  }
3201  else
3202  return false;
3203 }
3204 
3205 } // anonymous namespace

3207 void MainFrame::OnEditSelectNext(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
3208 {
3209  EditorBase* eb = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetActiveEditor();
3210  if (!eb || !eb->IsBuiltinEditor())
3211  return;
3212  cbStyledTextCtrl *control = static_cast<cbEditor*>(eb)->GetControl();
3213 
3214  EditorSelection selection;
3215  if (GetSelectionInEditor(selection, control) && !selection.Empty())
3216  {
3217  const wxString &selectedText(control->GetTextRange(selection.GetStart(), selection.GetEnd()));
3218  SelectNext(control, selectedText, selection.GetEnd(), selection.IsReversed());
3219  }
3220 }
3221 
3222 void MainFrame::OnEditSelectNextSkip(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
3223 {
3224  EditorBase* eb = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetActiveEditor();
3225  if (!eb || !eb->IsBuiltinEditor())
3226  return;
3227  cbStyledTextCtrl *control = static_cast<cbEditor*>(eb)->GetControl();
3228 
3229  EditorSelection selection;
3230  if (!GetSelectionInEditor(selection, control))
3231  return;
3232 
3233  ConfigManager *cfgEditor = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(wxT("editor"));
3234  bool highlightOccurrences = cfgEditor->ReadBool(wxT("/highlight_occurrence/enabled"), true);
3235 
3236  // store the selections in a vector except for the current one
3237  typedef std::vector<EditorSelection> Selections;
3238  Selections selections;
3239  int count = control->GetSelections();
3240  for (int ii = 0; ii < count; ++ii)
3241  {
3242  EditorSelection item;
3243  item.caret = control->GetSelectionNCaret(ii);
3244  item.anchor = control->GetSelectionNAnchor(ii);
3245 
3246  if (!item.Contains(selection))
3247  selections.push_back(item);
3248  else if (highlightOccurrences)
3249  {
3250  // Restore the indicator for the highlight occurrences if they are enabled.
3251  control->IndicatorFillRange(item.GetStart(), item.GetEnd());
3252  }
3253  }
3254 
3255  control->ClearSelections();
3256  Selections::const_iterator it = selections.begin();
3257  int index = 0;
3258  if (it != selections.end() && control->GetSelections() > 0)
3259  {
3260  control->SetSelectionNAnchor(index, it->anchor);
3261  control->SetSelectionNCaret(index, it->caret);
3262  ++index;
3263  ++it;
3264  }
3265  for (; it != selections.end(); ++it)
3266  {
3267  control->AddSelection(it->caret, it->anchor);
3268  ++index;
3269  }
3270 
3271  const wxString &selectedText(control->GetTextRange(selection.GetStart(), selection.GetEnd()));
3272  SelectNext(control, selectedText, selection.GetEnd(), selection.IsReversed());
3273 }

3275 /* This is a shameless rip-off of the original OnEditCommentSelected function,
3276  * now more suitingly named OnEditToggleCommentSelected (because that's what
3277  * it does :)
3278  */
3279 void MainFrame::OnEditCommentSelected(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
3280 {
3281  cbEditor* ed = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetBuiltinActiveEditor();
3282  if (!ed)
3283  return;
3284 
3285  cbStyledTextCtrl* stc = ed->GetControl();
3286  if (!stc)
3287  return;
3288 
3289  EditorColourSet* colour_set = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetColourSet();
3290  if (!colour_set)
3291  return;
3292 
3293  CommentToken comment = colour_set->GetCommentToken( ed->GetLanguage() );
3294  if (comment.lineComment==wxEmptyString && comment.streamCommentStart==wxEmptyString)
3295  return;
3296 
3297  stc->BeginUndoAction();
3298  if ( wxSCI_INVALID_POSITION != stc->GetSelectionStart() )
3299  {
3300  int startLine = stc->LineFromPosition( stc->GetSelectionStart() );
3301  int endLine = stc->LineFromPosition( stc->GetSelectionEnd() );
3302  int curLine=startLine;
3309  if (startLine != endLine && // selection is more than one line
3310  stc->GetColumn( stc->GetSelectionEnd() ) == 0) // and the caret is at the start of the line
3311  {
3312  // don't take into account the line the caret is on,
3313  // because it contains no selection (caret_column == 0)...
3314  --endLine;
3315  }
3316 
3317  while( curLine <= endLine )
3318  {
3319  // For each line: comment.
3320  if (comment.lineComment!=wxEmptyString)
3321  stc->InsertText( stc->PositionFromLine( curLine ), comment.lineComment );
3322  else // if the language doesn't support line comments use stream comments
3323  {
3324  stc->InsertText( stc->PositionFromLine( curLine ), comment.streamCommentStart );
3325  stc->InsertText( stc->GetLineEndPosition( curLine ), comment.streamCommentEnd );
3326  }
3327  ++curLine;
3328  } // end while
3329  stc->SetSelectionVoid(stc->PositionFromLine(startLine),stc->PositionFromLine(endLine)+stc->LineLength(endLine));
3330  }
3331  stc->EndUndoAction();
3332 }

3334 /* See above (OnEditCommentSelected) for details. */
3335 void MainFrame::OnEditUncommentSelected(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
3336 {
3337  cbEditor* ed = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetBuiltinActiveEditor();
3338  if (!ed)
3339  return;
3340 
3341  cbStyledTextCtrl* stc = ed->GetControl();
3342  if (!stc)
3343  return;
3344 
3345  EditorColourSet* colour_set = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetColourSet();
3346  if (!colour_set)
3347  return;
3348 
3349  CommentToken comment = colour_set->GetCommentToken( ed->GetLanguage() );
3350  if (comment.lineComment==wxEmptyString && comment.streamCommentStart==wxEmptyString)
3351  return;
3352 
3353  stc->BeginUndoAction();
3354  if ( wxSCI_INVALID_POSITION != stc->GetSelectionStart() )
3355  {
3356  int startLine = stc->LineFromPosition( stc->GetSelectionStart() );
3357  int endLine = stc->LineFromPosition( stc->GetSelectionEnd() );
3358  int curLine = startLine;
3365  if (startLine != endLine && // selection is more than one line
3366  stc->GetColumn( stc->GetSelectionEnd() ) == 0) // and the caret is at the start of the line
3367  {
3368  // don't take into account the line the caret is on,
3369  // because it contains no selection (caret_column == 0)...
3370  --endLine;
3371  }
3372 
3373  while( curLine <= endLine )
3374  {
3375  // For each line: if it is commented, uncomment.
3376  wxString strLine = stc->GetLine( curLine );
3377 
3378  bool startsWithComment;
3379  bool endsWithComment;
3380 
3381  // check for line comment
3382  startsWithComment = strLine.Strip( wxString::leading ).StartsWith( comment.lineComment );
3383  if ( startsWithComment )
3384  { // we know the comment is there (maybe preceded by white space)
3385  int Pos = strLine.Find(comment.lineComment);
3386  int start = stc->PositionFromLine( curLine ) + Pos;
3387  int end = start + comment.lineComment.Length();
3388  stc->SetTargetStart( start );
3389  stc->SetTargetEnd( end );
3390  stc->ReplaceTarget( wxEmptyString );
3391  }
3392 
3393  // check for stream comment
3394  startsWithComment = strLine.Strip( wxString::leading ).StartsWith( comment.streamCommentStart ); // check for stream comment start
3395  endsWithComment = strLine.Strip( wxString::trailing ).EndsWith( comment.streamCommentEnd); // check for stream comment end
3396  if ( startsWithComment && endsWithComment )
3397  {
3398  int Pos;
3399  int start;
3400  int end;
3401 
3402  // we know the start comment is there (maybe preceded by white space)
3403  Pos = strLine.Find(comment.streamCommentStart);
3404  start = stc->PositionFromLine( curLine ) + Pos;
3405  end = start + comment.streamCommentStart.Length();
3406  stc->SetTargetStart( start );
3407  stc->SetTargetEnd( end );
3408  stc->ReplaceTarget( wxEmptyString );
3409 
3410  // we know the end comment is there too (maybe followed by white space)
3411  // attention!! we have to subtract the length of the comment we already removed
3412  Pos = strLine.rfind(comment.streamCommentEnd,strLine.npos) - comment.streamCommentStart.Length();
3413  start = stc->PositionFromLine( curLine ) + Pos;
3414  end = start + comment.streamCommentEnd.Length();
3415  stc->SetTargetStart( start );
3416  stc->SetTargetEnd( end );
3417  stc->ReplaceTarget( wxEmptyString );
3418  }
3419  ++curLine;
3420  } // end while
3421  stc->SetSelectionVoid(stc->PositionFromLine(startLine),stc->PositionFromLine(endLine)+stc->LineLength(endLine));
3422  }
3423  stc->EndUndoAction();
3424 }
