3426 void MainFrame::OnEditToggleCommentSelected(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
3427 {
3428  cbEditor* ed = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetBuiltinActiveEditor();
3429  if (!ed)
3430  return;
3431 
3432  cbStyledTextCtrl* stc = ed->GetControl();
3433  if (!stc)
3434  return;
3435 
3436  EditorColourSet* colour_set = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetColourSet();
3437  if (!colour_set)
3438  return;
3439 
3440  wxString comment = colour_set->GetCommentToken( ed->GetLanguage() ).lineComment;
3441  if (comment==wxEmptyString)
3442  return;
3443 
3444  stc->BeginUndoAction();
3445  if ( wxSCI_INVALID_POSITION != stc->GetSelectionStart() )
3446  {
3447  int startLine = stc->LineFromPosition( stc->GetSelectionStart() );
3448  int endLine = stc->LineFromPosition( stc->GetSelectionEnd() );
3449  int curLine = startLine;
3456  if (startLine != endLine && // selection is more than one line
3457  stc->GetColumn( stc->GetSelectionEnd() ) == 0) // and the caret is at the start of the line
3458  {
3459  // don't take into account the line the caret is on,
3460  // because it contains no selection (caret_column == 0)...
3461  --endLine;
3462  }
3463 
3464  bool doComment = false;
3465  while( curLine <= endLine )
3466  {
3467  // Check is any of the selected lines is commented
3468  wxString strLine = stc->GetLine( curLine );
3469  int commentPos = strLine.Strip( wxString::leading ).Find( comment );
3470 
3471  if (commentPos != 0)
3472  {
3473  // At least one line is not commented, so comment the whole selection
3474  // (else if all lines are commented, uncomment the selection)
3475  doComment = true;
3476  break;
3477  }
3478  ++curLine;
3479  }
3480 
3481  curLine = startLine;
3482  while( curLine <= endLine )
3483  {
3484  if (doComment)
3485  stc->InsertText( stc->PositionFromLine( curLine ), comment );
3486  else
3487  {
3488  // we know the comment is there (maybe preceded by white space)
3489  wxString strLine = stc->GetLine( curLine );
3490  int Pos = strLine.Find(comment);
3491  int start = stc->PositionFromLine( curLine ) + Pos;
3492  int end = start + comment.Length();
3493  stc->SetTargetStart( start );
3494  stc->SetTargetEnd( end );
3495  stc->ReplaceTarget( wxEmptyString );
3496  }
3497  ++curLine;
3498  }
3499  stc->SetSelectionVoid(stc->PositionFromLine(startLine),stc->PositionFromLine(endLine)+stc->LineLength(endLine));
3500  }
3501  stc->EndUndoAction();
3502 }

3504 void MainFrame::OnEditStreamCommentSelected(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
3505 {
3506  cbEditor* ed = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetBuiltinActiveEditor();
3507  if (!ed)
3508  return;
3509 
3510  cbStyledTextCtrl* stc = ed->GetControl();
3511  if (!stc)
3512  return;
3513 
3514  EditorColourSet* colour_set = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetColourSet();
3515  if (!colour_set)
3516  return;
3517 
3518  CommentToken comment = colour_set->GetCommentToken( ed->GetLanguage() );
3519  if (comment.streamCommentStart==wxEmptyString)
3520  return;
3521 
3522  stc->BeginUndoAction();
3523  if ( wxSCI_INVALID_POSITION != stc->GetSelectionStart() )
3524  {
3525  int startPos = stc->GetSelectionStart();
3526  int endPos = stc->GetSelectionEnd();
3527  if ( startPos == endPos )
3528  { // if nothing selected stream comment current *word* first
3529  startPos = stc->WordStartPosition(stc->GetCurrentPos(), true);
3530  endPos = stc->WordEndPosition (stc->GetCurrentPos(), true);
3531  if ( startPos == endPos )
3532  { // if nothing selected stream comment current *line*
3533  startPos = stc->PositionFromLine (stc->LineFromPosition(startPos));
3534  endPos = stc->GetLineEndPosition(stc->LineFromPosition(startPos));
3535  }
3536  }
3537  else
3538  {
3545  if (stc->GetColumn( stc->GetSelectionEnd() ) == 0) // and the caret is at the start of the line
3546  {
3547  // don't take into account the line the caret is on,
3548  // because it contains no selection (caret_column == 0)...
3549  --endPos;
3550  }
3551  }
3552  // stream comment block
3553  int p1 = startPos - 1;
3554  while (stc->GetCharAt(p1) == _T(' ') && p1 > 0)
3555  --p1;
3556  p1 -= 1;
3557  int p2 = endPos;
3558  while (stc->GetCharAt(p2) == _T(' ') && p2 < stc->GetLength())
3559  ++p2;
3560  const wxString start = stc->GetTextRange(p1, p1 + comment.streamCommentStart.Length());
3561  const wxString end = stc->GetTextRange(p2, p2 + comment.streamCommentEnd.Length());
3562  if (start == comment.streamCommentStart && end == comment.streamCommentEnd)
3563  {
3564  stc->SetTargetStart(p1);
3565  stc->SetTargetEnd(p2 + 2);
3566  wxString target = stc->GetTextRange(p1 + 2, p2);
3567  stc->ReplaceTarget(target);
3568  stc->GotoPos(p1 + target.Length());
3569  }
3570  else
3571  {
3572  stc->InsertText( startPos, comment.streamCommentStart );
3573  // we already inserted some characters so out endPos changed
3574  startPos += comment.streamCommentStart.Length();
3575  endPos += comment.streamCommentStart.Length();
3576  stc->InsertText( endPos, comment.streamCommentEnd );
3577  stc->SetSelectionVoid(startPos,endPos);
3578  }
3579 
3580  }
3581  stc->EndUndoAction();
3582 }
3583 
3584 void MainFrame::OnEditBoxCommentSelected(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
3585 {
3586  cbEditor* ed = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetBuiltinActiveEditor();
3587  if (!ed)
3588  return;
3589 
3590  cbStyledTextCtrl* stc = ed->GetControl();
3591  if (!stc)
3592  return;

3595  if (!colour_set)
3596  return;
3597 
3598  CommentToken comment = colour_set->GetCommentToken( ed->GetLanguage() );
3599  if (comment.boxCommentStart==wxEmptyString)
3600  return;
3601 
3602  stc->BeginUndoAction();
3603  if ( wxSCI_INVALID_POSITION != stc->GetSelectionStart() )
3604  {
3605  int startLine = stc->LineFromPosition( stc->GetSelectionStart() );
3606  int endLine = stc->LineFromPosition( stc->GetSelectionEnd() );
3607  int curLine = startLine;
3614  if (startLine != endLine && // selection is more than one line
3615  stc->GetColumn( stc->GetSelectionEnd() ) == 0) // and the caret is at the start of the line
3616  {
3617  // don't take into account the line the caret is on,
3618  // because it contains no selection (caret_column == 0)...
3619  --endLine;
3620  }
3621

3623 
3624  if (startLine == endLine) // if selection is only one line ...
3625  {

3627  stc->InsertText( stc->PositionFromLine ( curLine ), comment.streamCommentStart );

3632  // insert boxcomment start token
3633  stc->InsertText( stc->PositionFromLine( curLine ), comment.boxCommentStart );
3634  ++curLine; // we already commented the first line about 9 lines above

3636  {

3638  stc->InsertText( stc->PositionFromLine( curLine ), comment.boxCommentMid );
3639  ++curLine;
3640  } // end while
3641 
3642  // insert boxcomment end token and add a new line character
3643  stc->InsertText( stc->PositionFromLine( curLine ), comment.boxCommentEnd + GetEOLStr(stc->GetEOLMode()) );
3644  } // end if
3645  stc->SetSelectionVoid(stc->PositionFromLine(startLine),stc->PositionFromLine(endLine)+stc->LineLength(endLine));
3646  }
3647  stc->EndUndoAction();

3822 void MainFrame::OnViewLayoutDelete(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
3823 {
3824  if (m_LastLayoutName == gDefaultLayout)
3825  {
3826  if (cbMessageBox(_("The default perspective cannot be deleted. It can always be reverted to "
3827  "a predefined state though.\nDo you want to revert it now?"),
3828  _("Confirmation"),
3829  wxICON_QUESTION | wxYES_NO | wxNO_DEFAULT) == wxID_YES)
3830  {
3831  m_LayoutViews[gDefaultLayout] = gDefaultLayoutData;
3832  m_LayoutMessagePane[gDefaultLayout] = gDefaultMessagePaneLayoutData;
3833  LoadViewLayout(gDefaultLayout);
3834  }
3835  return;
3836  }
3837 
3838  if (m_LastLayoutName == gMinimalLayout)
3839  {
3840  if (cbMessageBox(_("The minimal layout cannot be deleted. It can always be reverted to "
3841  "a predefined state though.\nDo you want to revert it now?"),
3842  _("Confirmation"),
3843  wxICON_QUESTION | wxYES_NO | wxNO_DEFAULT) == wxID_YES)
3844  {
3845  wxString tempLayout = m_PreviousLayoutName;
3846  m_LayoutViews[gMinimalLayout] = gMinimalLayoutData;
3847  m_LayoutMessagePane[gMinimalLayout] = gMinimalMessagePaneLayoutData;
3848  LoadViewLayout(gMinimalLayout);
3849  m_PreviousLayoutName = tempLayout;
3850  }
3851  return;
3852  }
3853 
3854  if (cbMessageBox(wxString::Format(_("Are you really sure you want to delete the perspective '%s'?"), m_LastLayoutName.wx_str()),
3855  _("Confirmation"),
3856  wxICON_QUESTION | wxYES_NO | wxNO_DEFAULT) == wxID_YES)
3857  {
3858  // first delete it from the hashmap
3859  LayoutViewsMap::iterator it = m_LayoutViews.find(m_LastLayoutName);
3860  if (it != m_LayoutViews.end())
3861  m_LayoutViews.erase(it);
3862  it = m_LayoutMessagePane.find(m_LastLayoutName);
3863  if (it != m_LayoutMessagePane.end())
3864  m_LayoutMessagePane.erase(it);
3865 
3866  // now delete the menu item too
3867  wxMenu* viewLayouts = nullptr;
3868  GetMenuBar()->FindItem(idViewLayoutSave, &viewLayouts);
3869  if (viewLayouts)
3870  {
3871  int id = viewLayouts->FindItem(m_LastLayoutName);
3872  if (id != wxNOT_FOUND)
3873  viewLayouts->Delete(id);
3874  // delete the id from the map too
3875  PluginIDsMap::iterator it2 = m_PluginIDsMap.find(id);
3876  if (it2 != m_PluginIDsMap.end())
3877  m_PluginIDsMap.erase(it2);
3878  }
3879 
3880  cbMessageBox(wxString::Format(_("Perspective '%s' deleted.\nWill now revert to perspective '%s'..."), m_LastLayoutName.wx_str(), gDefaultLayout.wx_str()),
3881  _("Information"), wxICON_INFORMATION);
3882 
3883  // finally, revert to the default layout
3884  m_LastLayoutName = gDefaultLayout; // do not ask to save old layout ;)
3885  LoadViewLayout(gDefaultLayout);
3886  }
3887 }

3889 void MainFrame::OnNotebookDoubleClick(cb_unused CodeBlocksEvent& event)

4117  // OK... this was the strangest/silliest/most-frustrating bug ever in the computer programs history...
4118  // Under wxGTK it seems that if you try to Check() a menu item if its container Menu is disabled,
4119  // you enter an endless message loop eating 100% CPU...

4134  default:

4136  break;

4140  || ed->GetEncoding() == wxLocale::GetSystemEncoding() );
4141

4144  mbar->Check(idEditEncodingAscii, ed && ed->GetEncoding() == wxFONTENCODING_ISO8859_1);
4145  mbar->Check(idEditEncodingUtf7, ed && ed->GetEncoding() == wxFONTENCODING_UTF7);

4283 namespace
4284 {
4285 struct ToolbarFitInfo
4286 {
4287  int row;
4288  wxRect rect;
4289  wxWindow *window;
4290 
4291  bool operator<(const ToolbarFitInfo &r) const
4292  {
4293  if (row < r.row)
4294  return true;
4295  else if (row == r.row)
4296  return rect.x < r.rect.x;
4297  else
4298  return false;
4299  }
4300 };
4301 
4302 static void CollectToolbars(std::set<ToolbarFitInfo> &result, wxAuiManager &layoutManager)
4303 {
4304  const wxAuiPaneInfoArray &panes = layoutManager.GetAllPanes();
4305  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < panes.GetCount(); ++ii)
4306  {
4307  const wxAuiPaneInfo &info = panes[ii];
4308  if (info.IsToolbar() && info.IsShown())
4309  {
4310  ToolbarFitInfo f;
4311  f.row = info.dock_row;
4312  f.rect = info.rect;
4313  f.window = info.window;
4314  result.insert(f);
4315  }
4316  }
4317 }
4318 
4319 struct ToolbarRowInfo
4320 {
4321  ToolbarRowInfo() {}
4322  ToolbarRowInfo(int width_, int position_) : width(width_), position(position_) {}
4323 
4324  int width, position;
4325 };
4326 
4327 // Function which tries to make all toolbars visible.
4328 static void FitToolbars(wxAuiManager &layoutManager, wxWindow *mainFrame)
4329 {
4330  std::set<ToolbarFitInfo> sorted;
4331  CollectToolbars(sorted, layoutManager);
4332  if (sorted.empty())
4333  return;
4334 
4335  int maxWidth = mainFrame->GetSize().x;
4336  int gripperSize = layoutManager.GetArtProvider()->GetMetric(wxAUI_DOCKART_GRIPPER_SIZE);
4337 
4338  // move all toolbars to the left as possible and add the non-fitting to a list
4339  std::vector<ToolbarRowInfo> rows;
4340  std::vector<wxWindow*> nonFitingToolbars;
4341  for (std::set<ToolbarFitInfo>::const_iterator it = sorted.begin(); it != sorted.end(); ++it)
4342  {
4343  wxAuiPaneInfo &pane = layoutManager.GetPane(it->window);
4344  int row = pane.dock_row;
4345  while (static_cast<int>(rows.size()) <= row)
4346  rows.push_back(ToolbarRowInfo(0, 0));
4347 
4348  int maxX = rows[row].width + it->window->GetBestSize().x + gripperSize;
4349  if (maxX > maxWidth)
4350  nonFitingToolbars.push_back(it->window);
4351  else
4352  {
4353  rows[row].width = maxX;
4354  pane.Position(rows[row].position++);
4355  }
4356  }
4357 
4358  // move the non-fitting toolbars at the bottom
4359  int lastRow = rows.empty() ? 0 : (rows.size() - 1);
4360  int position = rows.back().position, maxX = rows.back().width;
4361  for (std::vector<wxWindow*>::iterator it = nonFitingToolbars.begin(); it != nonFitingToolbars.end(); ++it)
4362  {
4363  maxX += (*it)->GetBestSize().x;
4364  maxX += gripperSize;
4365  if (maxX > maxWidth)
4366  {
4367  position = 0;
4368  lastRow++;
4369  maxX = (*it)->GetBestSize().x + gripperSize;
4370  }
4371  layoutManager.GetPane(*it).Position(position++).Row(lastRow);
4372  }
4373 }
4374 
4375 // Function which tries to minimize the space used by the toolbars.
4376 // Also it can be used to show toolbars which have gone outside the window.
4377 static void OptimizeToolbars(wxAuiManager &layoutManager, wxWindow *mainFrame)
4378 {
4379  std::set<ToolbarFitInfo> sorted;
4380  CollectToolbars(sorted, layoutManager);
4381  if (sorted.empty())
4382  return;
4383 
4384  int maxWidth = mainFrame->GetSize().x;
4385  int lastRow = 0, position = 0, maxX = 0;
4386  int gripperSize = layoutManager.GetArtProvider()->GetMetric(wxAUI_DOCKART_GRIPPER_SIZE);
4387 
4388  for (std::set<ToolbarFitInfo>::const_iterator it = sorted.begin(); it != sorted.end(); ++it)
4389  {
4390  maxX += it->window->GetBestSize().x;
4391  maxX += gripperSize;
4392  if (maxX > maxWidth)
4393  {
4394  position = 0;
4395  lastRow++;
4396  maxX = it->window->GetBestSize().x + gripperSize;
4397  }
4398  layoutManager.GetPane(it->window).Position(position++).Row(lastRow);
4399  }
4400 }
4401 
4402 } // anomymous namespace
4403

4406  FitToolbars(m_LayoutManager, this);
4407  DoUpdateLayout();
4408 }

4416 void MainFrame::OnToggleBar(wxCommandEvent& event)
4417 {
4418  wxWindow* win = nullptr;
4419  bool toolbar = false;
4420  if (event.GetId() == idViewManager)
4421  win = m_pPrjManUI->GetNotebook();
4422  else if (event.GetId() == idViewLogManager)
4423  win = m_pInfoPane;
4424  else if (event.GetId() == idViewToolMain)
4425  {
4426  win = m_pToolbar;
4427  toolbar = true;
4428  }
4429  else if (event.GetId() == idViewToolDebugger)
4430  {
4431  win = m_debuggerToolbarHandler->GetToolbar();
4432  toolbar = true;
4433  }
4434  else
4435  {
4436  wxString pluginName = m_PluginIDsMap[event.GetId()];
4437  if (!pluginName.IsEmpty())
4438  {
4439  cbPlugin* plugin = Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->FindPluginByName(pluginName);
4440  if (plugin)
4441  {
4442  win = m_PluginsTools[plugin];
4443  toolbar = true;
4444  }
4445  }
4446  }
4447 
4448  if (win)
4449  {
4450  // use last visible size as BestSize, Logs & others does no longer "forget" it's size
4451  if (!event.IsChecked())
4452  m_LayoutManager.GetPane(win).BestSize(win->GetSize());
4453 
4454  m_LayoutManager.GetPane(win).Show(event.IsChecked());
4455  if (toolbar)
4456  FitToolbars(m_LayoutManager, this);
4457  DoUpdateLayout();
4458  }
4459 }

4466  ConfigManager* cfg = Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"));

4476 void MainFrame::OnFocusEditor(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)

4497 void MainFrame::OnSwitchTabs(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
4498 {
4499  // Get the notebook from the editormanager:
4500  cbAuiNotebook* nb = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetNotebook();
4501  if (!nb)
4502  return;
4503 
4504  // Create container and add all open editors:
4505  wxSwitcherItems items;
4506  items.AddGroup(_("Open files"), wxT("editors"));
4507  if (!Manager::Get()->GetConfigManager(_T("app"))->ReadBool(_T("/environment/tabs_stacked_based_switching")))
4508  { // Switch tabs editor with tab order
4509  for (size_t i = 0; i < nb->GetPageCount(); ++i)
4510  {
4511  wxString title = nb->GetPageText(i);
4512  wxWindow* window = nb->GetPage(i);
4513 
4514  items.AddItem(title, title, GetEditorDescription(static_cast<EditorBase*> (window)), i, nb->GetPageBitmap(i)).SetWindow(window);
4515  }
4516 
4517  // Select the focused editor:
4518  int idx = items.GetIndexForFocus();
4519  if (idx != wxNOT_FOUND)
4520  items.SetSelection(idx);
4521  }
4522  else
4523  { // Switch tabs editor with last used order
4524  int index = 0;
4525  cbNotebookStack* body;
4526  for (body = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetNotebookStack(); body != NULL; body = body->next)
4527  {
4528  index = nb->GetPageIndex(body->window);
4529  if (index == wxNOT_FOUND)
4530  continue;
4531  wxString title = nb->GetPageText(index);
4532  items.AddItem(title, title, GetEditorDescription(static_cast<EditorBase*> (body->window)), index, nb->GetPageBitmap(index)).SetWindow(body->window);
4533  }
4534 
4535  // Select the focused editor:
4536  if(items.GetItemCount() > 2)
4537  items.SetSelection(2); // CTRL + TAB directly select the last editor, not the current one
4538  else
4539  items.SetSelection(items.GetItemCount()-1);
4540  }
4541 
4542  // Create the switcher dialog
4543  wxSwitcherDialog dlg(items, wxGetApp().GetTopWindow());
4544 
4545  // Ctrl+Tab workaround for non windows platforms:
4546  if (platform::cocoa)
4547  dlg.SetModifierKey(WXK_ALT);
4548  else if (platform::gtk)
4549  dlg.SetExtraNavigationKey(wxT(','));
4550 
4551  // Finally show the dialog:
4552  int answer = dlg.ShowModal();
4553 
4554  // If necessary change the selected editor:
4555  if ((answer == wxID_OK) && (dlg.GetSelection() != -1))
4556  {
4557  wxSwitcherItem& item = items.GetItem(dlg.GetSelection());
4558  wxWindow* win = item.GetWindow();
4559  if (win)
4560  {
4561  nb->SetSelection(item.GetId());
4562  win->SetFocus();
4563  }
4564  }
4565 }
4566

4581  | wxFULLSCREEN_NOBORDER | wxFULLSCREEN_NOCAPTION );
4582 
4583  // Create full screen-close button if we're in full screen
4584  if ( IsFullScreen() )
4585  {
4586  //
4587  // Show the button to the bottom-right of the container

4591

4594  containerSize.GetHeight() - buttonSize.GetHeight() );

4627 void MainFrame::OnPluginUnloaded(CodeBlocksEvent& event)
4628 {

4630  return;
4631

4634  cbStatusBar *sb = (cbStatusBar*)GetStatusBar();
4635  if ( sb )
4636  sb->RemoveField(plugin);
4637 
4638  // remove toolbar, if any
4639  if (m_PluginsTools[plugin])
4640  {
4641  // Disconnect the mouse right click event handler before the toolbar is destroyed
4642  bool result = m_PluginsTools[plugin]->Disconnect(wxID_ANY, wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOL_RCLICKED, wxCommandEventHandler(MainFrame::OnToolBarRightClick));
4643  cbAssert(result);

4645  m_PluginsTools[plugin]->Destroy();

4647  DoUpdateLayout();
4648  }

4825 void MainFrame::OnCtrlAltTab(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
4826 {
4827  wxCommandEvent dummy;
4828  switch (m_LastCtrlAltTabWindow)
4829  {
4830  case 1: // Focus is on the Mgmt. panel -> Cycle to Editor
4831  m_LastCtrlAltTabWindow = 2;
4832  OnFocusEditor(dummy);
4833  break;
4834  case 2: // Focus is on the Editor -> Cycle to Logs & others
4835  m_LastCtrlAltTabWindow = 3;
4836  OnFocusLogsAndOthers(dummy);
4837  break;
4838  case 3: // Focus is on Logs & others -> fall through
4839  default: // Focus (cycle to) the Mgmt. panel
4840  m_LastCtrlAltTabWindow = 1;
4841  OnFocusManagement(dummy);
4842  }
4843 }

4845 void MainFrame::OnRequestDockWindow(CodeBlocksDockEvent& event)
4846 {
4847  if (Manager::IsAppShuttingDown())
4848  return;
4849 
4850  wxAuiPaneInfo info;
4851  wxString name = event.name;
4852  if (name.IsEmpty())
4853  {
4854  static int idx = 0;
4855  name = wxString::Format(_T("UntitledPane%d"), ++idx);
4856  }
4857 // TODO (mandrav##): Check for existing pane with the same name
4858  info.Name(name);
4859  info.Caption(event.title.IsEmpty() ? name : event.title);
4860  switch (event.dockSide)
4861  {
4862  case CodeBlocksDockEvent::dsLeft: info.Left(); break;
4863  case CodeBlocksDockEvent::dsRight: info.Right(); break;
4864  case CodeBlocksDockEvent::dsTop: info.Top(); break;
4865  case CodeBlocksDockEvent::dsBottom: info.Bottom(); break;
4866  case CodeBlocksDockEvent::dsFloating: info.Float(); break;
4867  case CodeBlocksDockEvent::dsUndefined: // fall through
4868  default: break;
4869  }
4870  info.Show(event.shown);
4871  info.BestSize(event.desiredSize);
4872  info.FloatingSize(event.floatingSize);
4873  info.FloatingPosition(event.floatingPos);
4874  info.MinSize(event.minimumSize);
4875  info.Layer(event.stretch ? 1 : 0);
4876 
4877  if (event.row != -1)
4878  info.Row(event.row);
4879  if (event.column != -1)
4880  info.Position(event.column);
4881  info.CloseButton(event.hideable ? true : false);
4882  m_LayoutManager.AddPane(event.pWindow, info);
4883  DoUpdateLayout();
4884 }

5033 // Highlight Button
5034 void MainFrame::OnHighlightMenu(cb_unused wxCommandEvent& event)
5035 {
5036  cbEditor* ed = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetBuiltinActiveEditor();
5037  if (!ed) return;
5038 
5039  EditorColourSet* colour_set = Manager::Get()->GetEditorManager()->GetColourSet();
5040  if (!colour_set) return;
5041 
5042  wxMenu* hl = nullptr;
5043  GetMenuBar()->FindItem(idEditHighlightModeText, &hl);
5044  wxArrayString langs = colour_set->GetAllHighlightLanguages();
5045 
5046  wxMenu mm;
5047  mm.AppendRadioItem(idEditHighlightModeText, _("Plain text"),
5048  _("Switch highlighting mode for current document to \"Plain text\""));
5049  Connect(hl->FindItem(_("Plain text")), -1, wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,
5050  (wxObjectEventFunction) (wxEventFunction) (wxCommandEventFunction)
5051  &MainFrame::OnEditHighlightMode);
5052  for (size_t i = 0; i < langs.GetCount(); ++i)
5053  {
5054  if (i > 0 && !(i % 20))
5055  mm.Break(); // break into columns every 20 items
5056  mm.AppendRadioItem(hl->FindItem(langs[i]), langs[i],
5057  wxString::Format(_("Switch highlighting mode for current document to \"%s\""), langs[i].wx_str()));
5058  Connect(hl->FindItem(langs[i]), -1, wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED,
5059  (wxObjectEventFunction) (wxEventFunction) (wxCommandEventFunction)
5060  &MainFrame::OnEditHighlightMode);
5061  }
5062  int checkeditem = -1;
5063  checkeditem = hl->FindItem(colour_set->GetLanguageName(ed->GetLanguage()));
5064  if (checkeditem!=wxNOT_FOUND)
5065  mm.Check(checkeditem,true);
5066 
5067  wxRect rect;
5068  GetStatusBar()->GetFieldRect(1, rect);
5069  PopupMenu(&mm, GetStatusBar()->GetPosition() + rect.GetPosition());
5070 }

5099 void MainFrame::PopupToggleToolbarMenu()
5100 {
5101  wxMenuBar* menuBar = Manager::Get()->GetAppFrame()->GetMenuBar();
5102  int idx = menuBar->FindMenu(_("&View"));
5103  if (idx == wxNOT_FOUND)
5104  return;
5105  wxMenu* viewMenu = menuBar->GetMenu(idx);
5106  idx = viewMenu->FindItem(_("Toolbars"));
5107  if (idx == wxNOT_FOUND)
5108  return;
5109 
5110  // Clone the View -> Toolbars menu and show it as popup.
5111  wxMenu* toolbarMenu = viewMenu->FindItem(idx)->GetSubMenu();
5112  wxMenu menu;
5113  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < toolbarMenu->GetMenuItemCount(); ++ii)
5114  {
5115  wxMenuItem *old = toolbarMenu->FindItemByPosition(ii);
5116  if (!old)
5117  continue;
5118  wxMenuItem *item;
5119  item = new wxMenuItem(&menu, old->GetId(), old->GetItemLabelText(), old->GetHelp(), old->GetKind());
5120  menu.Append(item);
5121  }
5122  SetChecksForViewToolbarsMenu(menu);
5123  PopupMenu(&menu);
5124 }

5126 void MainFrame::SetChecksForViewToolbarsMenu(wxMenu &menu)
5127 {
5128  for (size_t i = 0; i < menu.GetMenuItemCount(); ++i)
5129  {
5130  wxMenuItem* item = menu.GetMenuItems()[i];
5131  wxString pluginName = m_PluginIDsMap[item->GetId()];
5132  if (!pluginName.IsEmpty())
5133  {
5134  cbPlugin* plugin = Manager::Get()->GetPluginManager()->FindPluginByName(pluginName);
5135  if (plugin)
5136  item->Check(m_LayoutManager.GetPane(m_PluginsTools[plugin]).IsShown());
5137  }
5138  }
5139 
5140  menu.Check(idViewToolMain, m_LayoutManager.GetPane(m_pToolbar).IsShown());
5141  menu.Check(idViewToolDebugger, m_LayoutManager.GetPane(m_debuggerToolbarHandler->GetToolbar(false)).IsShown());
5142 }
